These scores dynamically inform a Dynamic Multi-views Contrastive Framework (DMCF), which adaptively weights different temporal views to focus contrastive learning on diagnostically relevant, discrepant regions. Our encoder combines dilated convolutions with multi-head attention for robust feature extraction. Comprehensive experiments on Alzheimer's Disease EEG, Parkinson's Disease EEG, and Myocardial Infarction ECG datasets demonstrate CoDAC's superior performance across all metrics, consistently outperforming state-of-the-art baselines, especially under low label availability. Ablation studies further validate the critical contributions of CDE and DMCF. CoDAC offers a robust and interpretable solution for medical time series diagnosis, effectively mitigating data scarcity challenges.

</details>


### [285] [TFEC: Multivariate Time-Series Clustering via Temporal-Frequency Enhanced Contrastive Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07550)
*Zexi Tan,Tao Xie,Haoyi Xiao,Baoyao Yang,Yuzhu Ji,An Zeng,Xiang Zhang,Yiqun Zhang*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: TFEC提出了一种时间-频率增强对比学习框架，通过协同双路径表示和聚类分布学习，解决现有MTS聚类方法中忽略聚类信息和引入不合理归纳偏差的问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有基于对比学习的多元时间序列聚类方法存在两个关键局限：1) 在正负样本对构建时忽略聚类信息；2) 通过增强策略破坏时间依赖性和周期性等不合理归纳偏差，影响表示质量。

Method: 提出时间-频率增强对比学习框架，包含时间-频率协同增强机制以保持时间结构并生成低失真表示，设计协同双路径表示和聚类分布学习框架联合优化聚类结构和表示保真度。

Result: 在六个真实世界基准数据集上的实验表明，TFEC优于现有最先进方法，平均NMI增益达到4.48%，消融研究验证了设计有效性。

Conclusion: TFEC框架通过时间-频率协同增强和双路径学习，有效解决了MTS聚类中的表示质量问题，显著提升了聚类性能。

Abstract: Multivariate Time-Series (MTS) clustering is crucial for signal processing and data analysis. Although deep learning approaches, particularly those leveraging Contrastive Learning (CL), are prominent for MTS representation, existing CL-based models face two key limitations: 1) neglecting clustering information during positive/negative sample pair construction, and 2) introducing unreasonable inductive biases, e.g., destroying time dependence and periodicity through augmentation strategies, compromising representation quality. This paper, therefore, proposes a Temporal-Frequency Enhanced Contrastive (TFEC) learning framework. To preserve temporal structure while generating low-distortion representations, a temporal-frequency Co-EnHancement (CoEH) mechanism is introduced. Accordingly, a synergistic dual-path representation and cluster distribution learning framework is designed to jointly optimize cluster structure and representation fidelity. Experiments on six real-world benchmark datasets demonstrate TFEC's superiority, achieving 4.48% average NMI gains over SOTA methods, with ablation studies validating the design. The code of the paper is available at: https://github.com/yueliangy/TFEC.

</details>


### [286] [d3LLM: Ultra-Fast Diffusion LLM using Pseudo-Trajectory Distillation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07568)
*Yu-Yang Qian,Junda Su,Lanxiang Hu,Peiyuan Zhang,Zhijie Deng,Peng Zhao,Hao Zhang*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: d3LLM通过伪轨迹蒸馏和基于熵的多块解码技术，在保持准确性的同时显著提升扩散大语言模型的并行解码效率，实现了10倍于现有扩散模型和5倍于自回归模型的速度提升。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 扩散大语言模型(dLLMs)相比自回归模型具有并行解码和随机顺序生成的优势，但实际应用中面临准确性与并行性的权衡。现有方法通常只关注效率或性能的单一方面，缺乏平衡两者的解决方案。

Method: 提出d3LLM框架：1)训练阶段引入伪轨迹蒸馏，教导模型哪些token可以在早期步骤中自信解码以提升并行性；2)推理阶段采用基于熵的多块解码配合KV缓存刷新机制，在保持准确性的同时实现高并行性。

Result: 实验表明d3LLM相比vanilla LLaDA/Dream实现高达10倍加速，相比自回归模型实现5倍加速，且准确率下降很小。同时提出了AUP(Accuracy Under Parallelism)新评估指标。

Conclusion: d3LLM成功解决了扩散大语言模型的准确性与并行性权衡问题，通过创新的训练和推理技术实现了显著的效率提升，为扩散语言模型的实际应用提供了有效解决方案。

Abstract: Diffusion large language models (dLLMs) offer capabilities beyond those of autoregressive (AR) LLMs, such as parallel decoding and random-order generation. However, realizing these benefits in practice is non-trivial, as dLLMs inherently face an accuracy-parallelism trade-off. Despite increasing interest, existing methods typically focus on only one-side of the coin, targeting either efficiency or performance. To address this limitation, we propose d3LLM (Pseudo-Distilled Diffusion Large Language Model), striking a balance between accuracy and parallelism: (i) during training, we introduce pseudo-trajectory distillation to teach the model which tokens can be decoded confidently at early steps, thereby improving parallelism; (ii) during inference, we employ entropy-based multi-block decoding with a KV-cache refresh mechanism to achieve high parallelism while maintaining accuracy. To better evaluate dLLMs, we also introduce AUP (Accuracy Under Parallelism), a new metric that jointly measures accuracy and parallelism. Experiments demonstrate that our d3LLM achieves up to 10$\times$ speedup over vanilla LLaDA/Dream and 5$\times$ speedup over AR models without much accuracy drop. Our code is available at https://github.com/hao-ai-lab/d3LLM.

</details>


### [287] [Neural Architecture for Fast and Reliable Coagulation Assessment in Clinical Settings: Leveraging Thromboelastography](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07618)
*Yulu Wang,Ziqian Zeng,Jianjun Wu,Zhifeng Tang*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 提出PSR算法，利用小样本临床数据通过动态变化映射实现实时凝血监测，相比传统TEG方法将预测时间从1小时缩短到实时，性能提升显著。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统血栓弹力图(TEG)需要近1小时才能提供凝血监测结果，这种延迟可能导致死亡率升高。医疗AI面临的关键挑战是如何基于小数据集进行合理预测，并考虑不同患者群体间的差异，而传统深度学习方法在这方面表现不佳。

Method: 提出生理状态重建(PSR)算法，专门设计用于利用个体间的动态变化，通过多域特征提取(MDFE)整合不同时间信号，通过高层注意力机制(HLA)联合学习时间交互，并通过参数化动态注意力模块(DAM)维持生命体征计算的稳定性。

Result: 在4个TEG专用数据集上评估，PSR表现出色：凝血特征预测R² > 0.98，相比最先进方法误差减少约一半，推理时间也减半，实现了从1小时到实时的重大改进。

Conclusion: PSR算法通过漂移感知学习为数据稀缺的医疗AI应用开辟了新方向，不仅适用于血栓发现，还有更广泛的医疗应用潜力，实现了小样本下的高效实时监测。

Abstract: In an ideal medical environment, real-time coagulation monitoring can enable early detection and prompt remediation of risks. However, traditional Thromboelastography (TEG), a widely employed diagnostic modality, can only provide such outputs after nearly 1 hour of measurement. The delay might lead to elevated mortality rates. These issues clearly point out one of the key challenges for medical AI development: Mak-ing reasonable predictions based on very small data sets and accounting for variation between different patient populations, a task where conventional deep learning methods typically perform poorly. We present Physiological State Reconstruc-tion (PSR), a new algorithm specifically designed to take ad-vantage of dynamic changes between individuals and to max-imize useful information produced by small amounts of clini-cal data through mapping to reliable predictions and diagnosis. We develop MDFE to facilitate integration of varied temporal signals using multi-domain learning, and jointly learn high-level temporal interactions together with attentions via HLA; furthermore, the parameterized DAM we designed maintains the stability of the computed vital signs. PSR evaluates with 4 TEG-specialized data sets and establishes remarkable perfor-mance -- predictions of R2 > 0.98 for coagulation traits and error reduction around half compared to the state-of-the-art methods, and halving the inferencing time too. Drift-aware learning suggests a new future, with potential uses well be-yond thrombophilia discovery towards medical AI applica-tions with data scarcity.

</details>


### [288] [Beyond Sharpness: A Flatness Decomposition Framework for Efficient Continual Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07636)
*Yanan Chen,Tieliang Gong,Yunjiao Zhang,Wen Wen*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: FLAD是一个新颖的持续学习优化框架，通过分解锐度感知扰动为梯度对齐和随机噪声分量，仅保留噪声分量来提升泛化性能，同时引入轻量级调度方案减少计算开销。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有持续学习中的锐度感知方法存在两个关键限制：1) 将锐度正则化视为统一信号，未区分其组件的贡献；2) 引入大量计算开销，阻碍实际部署。

Method: 提出FLAD框架，将锐度感知扰动分解为梯度对齐和随机噪声分量，发现仅保留噪声分量能促进泛化；引入轻量级调度方案，在有限训练时间内保持性能增益；可无缝集成到各种持续学习范式中。

Result: FLAD在多种实验设置中持续优于标准和锐度感知优化器，展示了其在持续学习中的有效性和实用性。

Conclusion: FLAD通过分解锐度感知扰动并保留噪声分量，结合轻量级调度，解决了现有方法在计算开销和性能平衡方面的限制，为持续学习提供了有效且实用的优化方案。

Abstract: Continual Learning (CL) aims to enable models to sequentially learn multiple tasks without forgetting previous knowledge. Recent studies have shown that optimizing towards flatter loss minima can improve model generalization. However, existing sharpness-aware methods for CL suffer from two key limitations: (1) they treat sharpness regularization as a unified signal without distinguishing the contributions of its components. and (2) they introduce substantial computational overhead that impedes practical deployment. To address these challenges, we propose FLAD, a novel optimization framework that decomposes sharpness-aware perturbations into gradient-aligned and stochastic-noise components, and show that retaining only the noise component promotes generalization. We further introduce a lightweight scheduling scheme that enables FLAD to maintain significant performance gains even under constrained training time. FLAD can be seamlessly integrated into various CL paradigms and consistently outperforms standard and sharpness-aware optimizers in diverse experimental settings, demonstrating its effectiveness and practicality in CL.

</details>


### [289] [Improving Domain Generalization in Contrastive Learning using Adaptive Temperature Control](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07748)
*Robert Lewis,Katie Matton,Rosalind W. Picard,John Guttag*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 提出一种新的对比学习方法，通过调整InfoNCE损失中的温度参数，根据负样本与锚点来自相同域的概率来加权，从而提高表示学习的域不变性，改善分布外泛化性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 自监督对比学习在稀疏标注数据上表现良好，但当训练到测试数据存在分布偏移时性能会显著下降。特别是在训练数据来自多个域，而测试数据来自未见域且存在显著协变量偏移的情况下，需要提高学习表示的域不变性。

Method: 提出一种新的对比学习方法，利用域标签信息调整InfoNCE损失中的温度参数。具体来说，根据负样本与锚点来自相同域的概率来调整温度，从而对来自更相似域的负样本对进行加权，鼓励模型基于域不变属性进行样本区分。

Result: 在MNIST变体数据集上的实验表明，该方法在分布外泛化性能上优于域泛化基线方法。同时，该方法保持了强大的域内任务性能，在这一指标上显著优于基线方法。

Conclusion: 通过结合域标签信息调整对比学习中的温度参数，可以有效提高学习表示的域不变性，从而在保持域内性能的同时，显著改善模型在未见域上的分布外泛化能力。

Abstract: Self-supervised pre-training with contrastive learning is a powerful method for learning from sparsely labeled data. However, performance can drop considerably when there is a shift in the distribution of data from training to test time. We study this phenomenon in a setting in which the training data come from multiple domains, and the test data come from a domain not seen at training that is subject to significant covariate shift. We present a new method for contrastive learning that incorporates domain labels to increase the domain invariance of learned representations, leading to improved out-of-distribution generalization. Our method adjusts the temperature parameter in the InfoNCE loss -- which controls the relative weighting of negative pairs -- using the probability that a negative sample comes from the same domain as the anchor. This upweights pairs from more similar domains, encouraging the model to discriminate samples based on domain-invariant attributes. Through experiments on a variant of the MNIST dataset, we demonstrate that our method yields better out-of-distribution performance than domain generalization baselines. Furthermore, our method maintains strong in-distribution task performance, substantially outperforming baselines on this measure.

</details>


### [290] [Free-RBF-KAN: Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks with Adaptive Radial Basis Functions for Efficient Function Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07760)
*Shao-Ting Chiu,Siu Wun Cheung,Ulisses Braga-Neto,Chak Shing Lee,Rui Peng Li*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: Free-RBF-KAN提出了一种基于径向基函数的KAN架构，通过自适应学习网格和可训练平滑度来平衡计算效率和精度，在保持与原始B-spline KAN相当精度的同时实现更快的训练和推理。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 原始KAN使用B-spline基函数，计算开销大（De Boor算法）。虽然已有RBF-KAN尝试提高计算效率，但通常牺牲了精度。需要一种既能保持计算效率又不损失精度的KAN架构。

Method: 提出Free-RBF-KAN：1）使用可自由学习的RBF形状，动态对齐网格表示与激活模式；2）将平滑度作为与网络权重联合优化的核参数；3）提供RBF-KAN的通用普适性证明。

Result: 在多尺度函数逼近、物理信息机器学习、PDE解算子学习等广泛实验中，Free-RBF-KAN达到与原始B-spline KAN相当的精度，同时提供更快的训练和推理速度。

Conclusion: Free-RBF-KAN在计算效率和自适应分辨率之间取得了良好平衡，特别适用于高维结构化建模任务，是KAN架构的有力替代方案。

Abstract: Kolmogorov-Arnold Networks (KANs) have shown strong potential for efficiently approximating complex nonlinear functions. However, the original KAN formulation relies on B-spline basis functions, which incur substantial computational overhead due to De Boor's algorithm. To address this limitation, recent work has explored alternative basis functions such as radial basis functions (RBFs) that can improve computational efficiency and flexibility. Yet, standard RBF-KANs often sacrifice accuracy relative to the original KAN design. In this work, we propose Free-RBF-KAN, a RBF-based KAN architecture that incorporates adaptive learning grids and trainable smoothness to close this performance gap. Our method employs freely learnable RBF shapes that dynamically align grid representations with activation patterns, enabling expressive and adaptive function approximation. Additionally, we treat smoothness as a kernel parameter optimized jointly with network weights, without increasing computational complexity. We provide a general universality proof for RBF-KANs, which encompasses our Free-RBF-KAN formulation. Through a broad set of experiments, including multiscale function approximation, physics-informed machine learning, and PDE solution operator learning, Free-RBF-KAN achieves accuracy comparable to the original B-spline-based KAN while delivering faster training and inference. These results highlight Free-RBF-KAN as a compelling balance between computational efficiency and adaptive resolution, particularly for high-dimensional structured modeling tasks.

</details>


### [291] [Are LLM Decisions Faithful to Verbal Confidence?](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07767)
*Jiawei Wang,Yanfei Zhou,Siddartha Devic,Deqing Fu*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: LLMs虽然能表达不确定性，但无法根据风险调整决策策略，导致在高惩罚条件下仍不弃权，造成效用崩溃。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究LLMs表达的不确定性是否与模型的推理、知识或决策能力相关联，以及这种不确定性表达是否能转化为风险敏感的决策行为。

Method: 引入RiskEval框架，通过设置不同的错误惩罚来评估模型是否会调整弃权策略，测试模型在高惩罚条件下的决策行为。

Result: 前沿模型表现出关键分离：在表达口头置信度时缺乏成本意识，在高惩罚条件下缺乏战略响应性。即使频繁弃权是最优数学策略，模型也几乎从不弃权，导致效用崩溃。

Conclusion: 校准的口头置信度分数不足以创建可信赖和可解释的AI系统，因为当前模型缺乏将不确定性信号转化为最优风险敏感决策的战略能动性。

Abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs) can produce surprisingly sophisticated estimates of their own uncertainty. However, it remains unclear to what extent this expressed confidence is tied to the reasoning, knowledge, or decision making of the model. To test this, we introduce $\textbf{RiskEval}$: a framework designed to evaluate whether models adjust their abstention policies in response to varying error penalties. Our evaluation of several frontier models reveals a critical dissociation: models are neither cost-aware when articulating their verbal confidence, nor strategically responsive when deciding whether to engage or abstain under high-penalty conditions. Even when extreme penalties render frequent abstention the mathematically optimal strategy, models almost never abstain, resulting in utility collapse. This indicates that calibrated verbal confidence scores may not be sufficient to create trustworthy and interpretable AI systems, as current models lack the strategic agency to convert uncertainty signals into optimal and risk-sensitive decisions.

</details>


### [292] [DT-ICU: Towards Explainable Digital Twins for ICU Patient Monitoring via Multi-Modal and Multi-Task Iterative Inference](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07778)
*Wen Guo*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: DT-ICU是一个用于重症监护连续风险评估的多模态数字孪生框架，整合临床时间序列和静态信息，在MIMIC-IV数据集上优于基线模型，提供准确、稳健且可解释的预测。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 重症监护中需要连续的风险评估来监测患者状态变化，现有方法难以有效整合多模态临床数据（时间序列和静态信息）并进行实时更新预测。

Method: 提出DT-ICU多模态数字孪生框架，采用统一的多任务架构整合可变长度临床时间序列和静态患者信息，支持随着ICU住院期间新观察数据的积累而更新预测。

Result: 在大型公开数据集MIMIC-IV上评估，DT-ICU在不同评估设置下持续优于基线模型；入院后短时间内即可实现有意义的区分，更长观察窗口能进一步改善高风险患者排序；模态消融分析显示模型合理利用了干预措施、生理反应观察和上下文信息。

Conclusion: DT-ICU提供了准确、时间稳健且可解释的预测，展示了作为重症监护连续患者监测实用数字孪生框架的潜力，代码和模型权重已公开。

Abstract: We introduce DT-ICU, a multimodal digital twin framework for continuous risk estimation in intensive care. DT-ICU integrates variable-length clinical time series with static patient information in a unified multitask architecture, enabling predictions to be updated as new observations accumulate over the ICU stay. We evaluate DT-ICU on the large, publicly available MIMIC-IV dataset, where it consistently outperforms established baseline models under different evaluation settings. Our test-length analysis shows that meaningful discrimination is achieved shortly after admission, while longer observation windows further improve the ranking of high-risk patients in highly imbalanced cohorts. To examine how the model leverages heterogeneous data sources, we perform systematic modality ablations, revealing that the model learnt a reasonable structured reliance on interventions, physiological response observations, and contextual information. These analyses provide interpretable insights into how multimodal signals are combined and how trade-offs between sensitivity and precision emerge. Together, these results demonstrate that DT-ICU delivers accurate, temporally robust, and interpretable predictions, supporting its potential as a practical digital twin framework for continuous patient monitoring in critical care. The source code and trained model weights for DT-ICU are publicly available at https://github.com/GUO-W/DT-ICU-release.

</details>


### [293] [Optimal Learning Rate Schedule for Balancing Effort and Performance](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07830)
*Valentina Njaradi,Rodrigo Carrasco-Davis,Peter E. Latham,Andrew Saxe*

Main category: cs.LG

TL;DR: 本文提出一个规范性框架，将学习速度控制建模为最优控制问题，推导出最优学习率的闭式解，并探讨了自信程度和情景记忆对学习调节的影响。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 生物和人工代理都需要高效学习，但学习速度调节是一个基本挑战。代理需要在快速改进的收益与努力、不稳定性和资源消耗的成本之间取得平衡。目前缺乏一个统一的规范性框架来理解学习速度控制。

Method: 将学习速度控制建模为最优控制过程，代理最大化累积性能同时承担学习成本。推导出最优学习率的闭式解，该解依赖于代理当前和预期未来性能。通过数学分析探讨代理和任务参数如何影响学习率调度，并引入情景记忆机制来近似性能期望。

Result: 推导出具有闭环控制器形式的最优学习率解，该解在不同任务和架构中具有普适性。在简单学习模型中，可以数学分析学习率调度作为开环控制解。框架预测过度自信或自信不足如何影响参与度和坚持性，并展示情景记忆机制可以通过回忆类似过去学习经验来近似性能期望。

Conclusion: 该研究为学习速度控制提供了一个规范性和生物学合理的解释，将自我调节学习、努力分配和情景记忆估计统一在一个可处理的数学框架中，为理解生物和人工代理如何优化学习过程提供了理论基础。

Abstract: Learning how to learn efficiently is a fundamental challenge for biological agents and a growing concern for artificial ones. To learn effectively, an agent must regulate its learning speed, balancing the benefits of rapid improvement against the costs of effort, instability, or resource use. We introduce a normative framework that formalizes this problem as an optimal control process in which the agent maximizes cumulative performance while incurring a cost of learning. From this objective, we derive a closed-form solution for the optimal learning rate, which has the form of a closed-loop controller that depends only on the agent's current and expected future performance. Under mild assumptions, this solution generalizes across tasks and architectures and reproduces numerically optimized schedules in simulations. In simple learning models, we can mathematically analyze how agent and task parameters shape learning-rate scheduling as an open-loop control solution. Because the optimal policy depends on expectations of future performance, the framework predicts how overconfidence or underconfidence influence engagement and persistence, linking the control of learning speed to theories of self-regulated learning. We further show how a simple episodic memory mechanism can approximate the required performance expectations by recalling similar past learning experiences, providing a biologically plausible route to near-optimal behaviour. Together, these results provide a normative and biologically plausible account of learning speed control, linking self-regulated learning, effort allocation, and episodic memory estimation within a unified and tractable mathematical framework.

</details>


<div id='econ.EM'></div>

# econ.EM [[Back]](#toc)

### [294] [Long-Term Causal Inference with Many Noisy Proxies](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06359)
*Apoorva Lal,Guido Imbens,Peter Hull*

Main category: econ.EM

TL;DR: 提出一种利用多个短期代理结果估计长期处理效应的方法，通过正则化回归处理高维代理变量，证明Ridge回归在增加代理变量时偏差减小，并在加州GAIN实验中验证。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 数字平台实验中，长期处理效应难以直接观测，但存在许多短期代理结果。如何有效利用这些高维代理变量来估计长期效应是一个核心挑战。

Method: 将问题形式化为潜在变量问题，观测到的代理变量是低维未观测替代变量的噪声测量。采用正则化回归方法（特别是Ridge回归）来处理高维代理变量，推导偏差-方差权衡的闭式表达式。

Result: 理论分析和模拟显示，正则化回归方法显著优于简单的代理选择方法。Ridge回归的偏差随代理变量增加而减小，并提供了偏差-方差权衡的闭式表达式。

Conclusion: 该方法能有效利用多个短期代理结果估计长期处理效应，在加州GAIN实验中得到验证，为数字平台实验中的长期效应估计提供了实用解决方案。

Abstract: We propose a method for estimating long-term treatment effects with many short-term proxy outcomes: a central challenge when experimenting on digital platforms. We formalize this challenge as a latent variable problem where observed proxies are noisy measures of a low-dimensional set of unobserved surrogates that mediate treatment effects. Through theoretical analysis and simulations, we demonstrate that regularized regression methods substantially outperform naive proxy selection. We show in particular that the bias of Ridge regression decreases as more proxies are added, with closed-form expressions for the bias-variance tradeoff. We illustrate our method with an empirical application to the California GAIN experiment.

</details>


### [295] [The Promise of Time-Series Foundation Models for Agricultural Forecasting: Evidence from Marketing Year Average Prices](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06371)
*Le Wang,Boyuan Zhang*

Main category: econ.EM

TL;DR: 时间序列基础模型在农业市场预测中首次系统性超越传统简单方法，Time-MoE模型相比USDA基准提升45%准确率


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 农业市场预测长期面临非线性动态、结构断裂和稀疏数据等挑战，传统观点认为简单时间序列方法通常优于复杂模型。本研究旨在验证这一观点在现代时间序列基础模型时代是否仍然成立。

Method: 使用1997-2025年USDA ERS数据，评估17种预测方法（涵盖四个模型类别），包括五种最先进的时间序列基础模型。采用零样本基础模型方法（仅使用历史价格数据，无额外协变量），并与传统时间序列方法、机器学习模型和从头训练的深度学习架构进行对比。

Result: 零样本基础模型在所有评估方法中表现最佳，Time-MoE模型整体MAE提升45%，玉米和大豆预测准确率提升超过50%。时间序列基础模型首次系统性超越传统简单基准方法。

Conclusion: 农业预测正经历范式转变：早期复杂模型难以超越简单基准，而现代预训练基础模型实现了显著且稳健的改进，为高风险预测分析提供了可扩展的强大新框架。

Abstract: Forecasting agricultural markets remains a core challenge in business analytics, where nonlinear dynamics, structural breaks, and sparse data have historically limited the gains from increasingly complex econometric and machine learning models. As a result, a long-standing belief in the literature is that simple time-series methods often outperform more advanced alternatives. This paper provides the first systematic evidence that this belief no longer holds in the modern era of time-series foundation models (TSFMs). Using USDA ERS data from 1997-2025, we evaluate 17 forecasting approaches across four model classes, assessing monthly forecasting performance and benchmarking against Market Year Average (MYA) price predictions. This period spans multiple agricultural cycles, major policy changes, and major market disruptions, with substantial cross-commodity price volatility. Focusing on five state-of-the-art TSFMs, we show that zero-shot foundation models (with only historical prices and without any additional covariates) consistently outperform traditional time-series methods, machine learning models, and deep learning architectures trained from scratch. Among them, Time-MoE delivers the largest accuracy gains, improving forecasts by 45% (MAE) overall and by more than 50% for corn and soybeans relative to USDA benchmarks. These results point to a paradigm shift in agricultural forecasting: while earlier generations of advanced models struggled to surpass simple benchmarks, modern pre-trained foundation models achieve substantial and robust improvements, offering a scalable and powerful new framework for highstakes predictive analytics.

</details>


### [296] [Sign Accuracy, Mean-Squared Error and the Rate of Zero Crossings: a Generalized Forecast Approach](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06547)
*Marc Wildi*

Main category: econ.EM

TL;DR: 提出平滑符号准确度（SSA）框架，同时考虑符号准确度、均方误差和预测符号变化频率，解决预测中的准确度-平滑度困境。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统预测优化标准通常只关注单一指标（如最小化均方误差），忽略了预测性能的其他重要方面，无法平衡多个相互冲突的优先级和目标。

Method: 引入平滑符号准确度（SSA）框架，同时考虑符号准确度、均方误差和预测符号变化频率，将多种设计目标整合到预测性能中，并扩展到非平稳积分过程，特别关注控制预测器的单调性。

Result: SSA标准能够有效整合与准确度-平滑度预测性能相关的各种设计目标，推广了传统的基于均方误差的指标，并在商业周期分析工具中展示了广泛适用性。

Conclusion: SSA框架提供了一种平衡预测中多个相互冲突目标的综合方法，解决了准确度-平滑度困境，具有跨不同预测场景的广泛适用性。

Abstract: Forecasting entails a complex estimation challenge, as it requires balancing multiple, often conflicting, priorities and objectives. Traditional forecast optimization criteria typically focus on a single metric -such as minimizing the mean squared error (MSE)- which may overlook other important aspects of predictive performance. In response, we introduce a novel approach called the Smooth Sign Accuracy (SSA) framework, which simultaneously considers sign accuracy, MSE, and the frequency of sign changes in the predictor. This addresses a fundamental trade-off (the so-called accuracy-smoothness (AS) dilemma) in prediction. The SSA criterion thus enables the integration of various design objectives related to AS forecasting performance, effectively generalizing conventional MSE-based metrics. We further extend this methodology to accommodate non-stationary, integrated processes, with particular emphasis on controlling the predictor's monotonicity. Moreover, we demonstrate the broad applicability of our approach through an application to, and customization of, established business cycle analysis tools, highlighting its versatility across diverse forecasting contexts.

</details>


### [297] [Empirical Bayes Estimation in Heterogeneous Coefficient Panel Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07059)
*Myunghyun Song,Sokbae Lee,Serena Ng*

Main category: econ.EM

TL;DR: 提出用于短面板线性模型的经验贝叶斯G建模框架，支持多维异质性和非参数先验，使用Wasserstein-Fisher-Rao梯度流算法计算NPMLE，在PSID数据中验证效果


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统面板模型通常假设同质性或简单的异质性结构，无法充分捕捉个体间的复杂多维异质性和非球形误差协方差结构，需要更灵活的建模框架

Method: 开发经验贝叶斯G建模框架，允许异质性截距、斜率、动态性和非球形误差协方差结构，使用非参数最大似然估计器，采用Wasserstein-Fisher-Rao梯度流算法进行计算

Result: 建立了NPMLE的识别性和一致性条件，经验贝叶斯估计器相对于个体最大似然估计减少了均方预测误差，在PSID数据中发现潜在经验系数存在显著异质性且与随机截距负相关

Conclusion: 提出的经验贝叶斯G建模框架能有效处理面板数据中的多维异质性，提供更准确的估计和预测，为实证研究提供了灵活的工具

Abstract: We develop an empirical Bayes (EB) G-modeling framework for short-panel linear models with multidimensional heterogeneity and nonparametric prior. Specifically, we allow heterogeneous intercepts, slopes, dynamics, and a non-spherical error covariance structure. We establish identification and consistency of the nonparametric maximum likelihood estimator (NPMLE) under general conditions, and provide low-level sufficient conditions for several models of empirical interest. Conditions for regret consistency of the resulting EB estimators are also established. The NPMLE is computed using a Wasserstein-Fisher-Rao gradient flow algorithm adapted to panel regressions. Using data from the Panel Study of Income Dynamics, we find that the slope coefficient for potential experience is substantially heterogeneous and negatively correlated with the random intercept, and that error variances and autoregressive coefficients vary significantly across individuals. The EB estimates reduce mean squared prediction errors relative to individual maximum likelihood estimates.

</details>


### [298] [Riesz Representer Fitting under Bregman Divergence: A Unified Framework for Debiased Machine Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07752)
*Masahiro Kato*

Main category: econ.EM

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一个统一框架，将Riesz表示器估计的各种方法（包括Riesz回归和协变量平衡）整合到Bregman散度下，称为广义Riesz回归，并揭示了自动协变量平衡的对应关系。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在去偏机器学习中，Riesz表示器估计是因果和结构参数估计的核心问题。现有方法如Riesz回归和协变量平衡各自发展，缺乏统一的理论框架。本研究旨在将这些方法统一起来，提供一个更通用的分析视角。

Method: 提出广义Riesz回归框架，在Bregman散度下拟合Riesz表示器模型。平方损失对应Riesz回归，KL散度对应定制损失最小化。该框架将密度比拟合推广到Riesz表示器估计，并分析了RKHS和神经网络两种模型类的收敛性。

Result: 建立了Riesz回归与平方损失、稳定平衡权重与KL散度的对应关系。证明了广义Riesz回归框架能够统一现有方法，揭示了自动协变量平衡的数学本质。提供了RKHS和神经网络模型的理论收敛分析。

Conclusion: 该研究成功地将Riesz表示器估计的各种方法统一到Bregman散度框架下，提出了广义Riesz回归方法，揭示了不同损失函数与不同平衡权重方法的对应关系，为去偏机器学习提供了更通用的理论基础和分析工具。

Abstract: Estimating the Riesz representer is a central problem in debiased machine learning for causal and structural parameter estimation. Various methods for Riesz representer estimation have been proposed, including Riesz regression and covariate balancing. This study unifies these methods within a single framework. Our framework fits a Riesz representer model to the true Riesz representer under a Bregman divergence, which includes the squared loss and the Kullback--Leibler (KL) divergence as special cases. We show that the squared loss corresponds to Riesz regression, and the KL divergence corresponds to tailored loss minimization, where the dual solutions correspond to stable balancing weights and entropy balancing weights, respectively, under specific model specifications. We refer to our method as generalized Riesz regression, and we refer to the associated duality as automatic covariate balancing. Our framework also generalizes density ratio fitting under a Bregman divergence to Riesz representer estimation, and it includes various applications beyond density ratio estimation. We also provide a convergence analysis for both cases where the model class is a reproducing kernel Hilbert space (RKHS) and where it is a neural network.

</details>


<div id='eess.SY'></div>

# eess.SY [[Back]](#toc)

### [299] [Koopman Model Dimension Reduction via Variational Bayesian Inference and Graph Search](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06315)
*Selin Ezgi Ozcan,Mustafa Mert Ankarali*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出基于变分贝叶斯推断的分层概率方法，通过包含标志和基于图搜索的算法减少Koopman模型预选状态维度，解决高维过拟合和长期预测性能下降问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有数据驱动的Koopman算子近似方法通常需要预选函数空间中的状态定义，导致高维过拟合模型和长期预测性能下降。需要解决模型维度选择和过拟合问题。

Method: 提出分层概率方法，将模型元素视为随机变量，使用变分贝叶斯推断更新后验估计。通过包含标志直观阈值化模型中每个状态的概率，并提出基于图搜索的算法减少Koopman模型的预选状态。

Result: 该方法克服了数值不稳定性，减少后的模型在模拟和真实实验中保持性能，证明了方法的有效性。

Conclusion: 提出的分层概率方法和状态减少算法能够有效解决Koopman模型的高维过拟合问题，提高长期预测性能，同时保持模型性能。

Abstract: Koopman operator recently gained increasing attention in the control systems community for its abilities to bridge linear and nonlinear systems. Data driven Koopman operator approximations have established themselves as key enablers for system identification and model predictive control. Nonetheless, such methods commonly entail a preselected definition of states in the function space leading to high dimensional overfitting models and degraded long term prediction performances. We address this problem by proposing a hierarchical probabilistic approach for the Koopman model identification problem. In our method, elements of the model are treated as random variables and the posterior estimates are found using variational Bayesian (VB) inference updates. Our model distinguishes from others in the integration of inclusion flags. By the help of the inclusion flags, we intuitively threshold the probability of each state in the model. We then propose a graph search based algorithm to reduce the preselected states of the Koopman model. We demonstrate that our reduction method overcomes numerical instabilities and the reduced models maintain performance in simulated and real experiments.

</details>


### [300] [A Data-Driven Surrogate Modeling and Sensor/Actuator Placement Framework for Flexible Spacecraft](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06325)
*Matthew Hilsenrath,Daniel R. Herber*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种数据驱动的柔性航天器降阶建模框架，结合动态模态分解和优化传感器/执行器布置，实现无需解析模型的物理建模初始化。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 柔性航天器结构由于非线性动力学、任务约束、环境变量和变化的工作条件，给物理和控制设计带来重大挑战。需要一种无需直接解析模型的数据驱动方法来构建降阶模型。

Method: 使用动态模态分解从非线性柔性航天器模型的高保真仿真数据构建模态模型，通过非线性规划技术最大化Hankel矩阵奇异值来优化传感器/执行器布置，并迭代考虑传感器/执行器物理质量对系统的影响。

Result: 实现了显著的模型降阶同时保持动态保真度，获得了有效的传感器-执行器配置用于估计和控制，为模型基控制和估计系统提供了实用的机载实现方案。

Conclusion: 提出的方法能够在不需直接解析模型的情况下初始化物理建模，为柔性航天器的模型基控制和估计系统提供了实用的数据驱动解决方案。

Abstract: Flexible spacecraft structures present significant challenges for physical and control system design due to nonlinear dynamics, mission constraints, environmental variables, and changing operational conditions. This paper presents a data-driven framework for constructing reduced-order surrogate models of a flexible spacecraft using the method of Dynamic Mode Decomposition (DMD), followed by optimal sensor/actuator pair placement. Highfidelity simulation data from a nonlinear flexible spacecraft model, including coupled rigid-body and elastic modes, are captured by defining a mesh of nodes over the spacecraft body. The data-driven methods are then used to construct a modal model from the time histories of these node points. Optimal sensor/actuator placement for controllability and observability is performed via a nonlinear programming technique that maximizes the singular values of the Hankel matrix. Finally, the sensor placement and dynamics modeling approach is iterated to account for changes in the dynamic system introduced by sensor/actuator physical mass. The proposed methodology enables initialization of physical modeling without requiring a direct analytical model and provides a practical solution for onboard implementation in model-based control and estimation systems. Results demonstrate optimal design methodology with substantial model-order reduction while preserving dynamic fidelity, and provide insight into effective sensor-actuator configurations for estimation and control.

</details>


### [301] [Deep Reinforcement Learning based Control Design for Aircraft Recovery from Loss-of-Control Scenario](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06439)
*Imran Sayyed,Aayush Konar,Nandan Kumar Sinha*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该研究使用深度强化学习训练PPO智能体，为F-18/HARV飞机失速后进入平螺旋状态提供恢复控制策略，相比传统方法表现更优。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 固定翼飞机失控（LOC）仍是主要事故原因，特别是在失速后和平螺旋状态下，传统的增益调度或基于逻辑的恢复控制可能失效，需要更有效的恢复策略。

Method: 将螺旋恢复问题建模为连续状态-动作马尔可夫决策过程，使用PPO算法在高保真六自由度F-18/HARV模型上训练智能体，采用两阶段基于势能的奖励结构。

Result: 经过6000次模拟训练后，学习到的策略能成功抑制角速度、稳定攻角，在未见过的失控初始条件下表现良好，性能优于最先进的滑模控制器。

Conclusion: 深度强化学习能够为实时失控缓解提供可解释、动态可行的机动策略，为飞行关键RL部署提供了可行路径。

Abstract: Loss-of-control (LOC) remains a leading cause of fixed-wing aircraft accidents, especially in post-stall and flat-spin regimes where conventional gain-scheduled or logic-based recovery laws may fail. This study formulates spin-recovery as a continuous-state, continuous-action Markov Decision Process and trains a Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) agent on a high-fidelity six-degree-of-freedom F-18/HARV model that includes nonlinear aerodynamics, actuator saturation and rate coupling. A two-phase potential-based reward structure first penalizes large angular rates and then enforces trimmed flight. After 6,000 simulated episodes, the policy generalities to unseen upset initializations. Results show that the learned policy successfully arrests the angular rates and stabilizes the angle of attack. The controller performance is observed to be satisfactory for recovery from spin condition which was compared with a state-of-the-art sliding mode controller. The findings demonstrate that deep reinforcement learning can deliver interpretable, dynamically feasible manoeuvres for real-time loss of control mitigation and provide a pathway for flight-critical RL deployment.

</details>


### [302] [Hybrid LSTM-UKF Framework: Ankle Angle and Ground Reaction Force Estimation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06473)
*Mundla Narasimhappa,Praveen Kumar*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出混合LSTM-UKF框架，通过多模态传感器融合预测不同步行速度下的踝关节角度和地面反作用力，相比单独模型显著提升预测精度和鲁棒性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 准确预测关节运动学和动力学对于步态分析和智能辅助系统（如假肢和外骨骼）的发展至关重要，需要能够适应不同步行条件的可靠预测方法。

Method: 采用混合LSTM-UKF框架，通过多模态传感器融合策略整合测力台数据、膝关节角度和地面反作用力信号，丰富生物力学上下文信息。

Result: LSTM-UKF在受试者特定验证中表现最佳，在3 km/h时GRF预测的RMSE降低达18.6%，在1 km/h时踝关节角度RMSE相比单独UKF降低达22.4%，显示出更好的鲁棒性。

Conclusion: 混合架构在不同受试者和步行条件下都能实现可靠的步态预测，证明了传感器融合和混合模型在生物力学预测中的有效性。

Abstract: Accurate prediction of joint kinematics and kinetics is essential for advancing gait analysis and developing intelligent assistive systems such as prosthetics and exoskeletons. This study presents a hybrid LSTM-UKF framework for estimating ankle angle and ground reaction force (GRF) across varying walking speeds. A multimodal sensor fusion strategy integrates force plate data, knee angle, and GRF signals to enrich biomechanical context. Model performance was evaluated using RMSE and $R^2$ under subject-specific validation. The LSTM-UKF consistently outperformed standalone LSTM and UKF models, achieving up to 18.6\% lower RMSE for GRF prediction at 3 km/h. Additionally, UKF integration improved robustness, reducing ankle angle RMSE by up to 22.4\% compared to UKF alone at 1 km/h. These results underscore the effectiveness of hybrid architectures for reliable gait prediction across subjects and walking conditions.

</details>


### [303] [Coupling Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics with Multi-Agent Deep Reinforcement Learning for Cooperative Control of Point Absorbers](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06485)
*Yi Zhan,Iván Martínez-Estévez,Min Luo,Alejandro J. C. Crespo,Abbas Khayyer*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该研究开发了一种结合平滑粒子流体动力学(SPH)与多智能体深度强化学习的最优自适应阻尼控制模型，用于波浪能转换器阵列，在GPU加速环境中实现实时智能控制，能量捕获效率相比恒定阻尼提高了23.8%和21.5%。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 波浪能转换器（特别是点吸收器）是海洋波浪能收集的重要技术，但由于波浪与设备运动之间的复杂非线性相互作用，实现高转换效率仍然具有挑战性。需要开发智能控制方法来优化能量捕获。

Method: 结合平滑粒子流体动力学(SPH)与多智能体深度强化学习，采用集中训练-分散执行方案，使用多智能体软演员-评论家算法，在GPU加速的C++统一环境中实现实时通信和控制。

Result: 在规则和不规则波浪条件下，通过二维和三维基准案例验证，学习到的控制策略相比恒定PTO阻尼，整体能量捕获分别提高了23.8%和21.5%。

Conclusion: 该研究证明了智能控制在提高波浪能转换器阵列性能方面的强大潜力，开发的GPU加速多智能体平台可扩展到其他需要实时多体协调控制的流体-结构相互作用工程问题。

Abstract: Wave Energy Converters, particularly point absorbers, have emerged as one of the most promising technologies for harvesting ocean wave energy. Nevertheless, achieving high conversion efficiency remains challenging due to the inherently complex and nonlinear interactions between incident waves and device motion dynamics. This study develops an optimal adaptive damping control model for the power take-off (PTO) system by coupling Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics (SPH) with multi-agent deep reinforcement learning. The proposed framework enables real-time communication between high-fidelity SPH simulations and intelligent control agents that learn coordinated policies to maximise energy capture. In each training episode, the SPH-based environment provides instantaneous hydrodynamic states to the agents, which output continuous damping actions and receive rewards reflecting power absorption. The Multi-Agent Soft Actor Critic algorithm is employed within a centralised-training and decentralised-execution scheme to ensure stable learning in continuous, multi-body systems. The entire platform is implemented in a unified GPU-accelerated C++ environment, allowing long-horizon training and large-scale three-dimensional simulations. The approach is validated through a series of two-dimensional and three-dimensional benchmark cases under regular and irregular wave conditions. Compared with constant PTO damping, the learned control policy increases overall energy capture by 23.8% and 21.5%, respectively, demonstrating the strong potential of intelligent control for improving the performance of wave energy converter arrays. The developed three-dimensional GPU-accelerated multi-agent platform in computational hydrodynamics, is extendable to other fluid-structure interaction engineering problem that require real-time, multi-body coordinated control.

</details>


### [304] [Convergence Analysis of Weighted Median Opinion Dynamics with Higher-Order Effects](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06515)
*Lingrui Chen,Xu Zhang,Fanpeng Song,Fang Wang,Cunquan Qu,Zhixin Liu*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出了一种基于单纯复形表示的高阶加权中位数意见动力学模型，建立了异质和同质系统的渐近共识条件，并分析了收敛性


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有加权中位数机制主要基于成对交互图，无法有效表示高阶环境效应，需要扩展到高阶交互场景

Method: 通过单纯复形表示引入高阶交互，构建非线性离散时间系统，同步更新意见，同时建模智能体内在交互和外部环境影响

Result: 为异质系统（含意见化和无意见化智能体）建立了渐近共识的充分条件；对同质意见化系统，使用Banach不动点定理严格分析了收敛性和收敛速率

Conclusion: 该工作将基于中位数的意见动力学扩展到高阶交互场景，为稳定性和共识分析提供了系统级框架，理论结果在温和条件下证明了动态稳定性

Abstract: The weighted median mechanism provides a robust alternative to weighted averaging in opinion dynamics. Existing models, however, are predominantly formulated on pairwise interaction graphs, which limits their ability to represent higher-order environmental effects. In this work, a generalized weighted median opinion dynamics model is proposed by incorporating high-order interactions through a simplicial complex representation. The resulting dynamics are formulated as a nonlinear discrete-time system with synchronous opinion updates, in which intrinsic agent interactions and external environmental influences are jointly modeled. Sufficient conditions for asymptotic consensus are established for heterogeneous systems composed of opinionated and unopinionated agents. For homogeneous opinionated systems, convergence and convergence rates are rigorously analyzed using the Banach fixed-point theorem. Theoretical results demonstrate the stability of the proposed dynamics under mild conditions, and numerical simulations are provided to corroborate the analysis. This work extends median-based opinion dynamics to high-order interaction settings and provides a system-level framework for stability and consensus analysis.

</details>


### [305] [Self-Organizing Dual-Buffer Adaptive Clustering Experience Replay (SODASER) for Safe Reinforcement Learning in Optimal Control](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06540)
*Roya Khalili Amirabadi,Mohsen Jalaeian Farimani,Omid Solaymani Fard*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出SODACER强化学习框架，结合双缓冲经验回放与自适应聚类，集成控制屏障函数保证安全性，使用Sophia优化器提升收敛，在非线性HPV传播模型上验证了优越性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 针对非线性系统的安全、可扩展最优控制问题，传统经验回放方法存在样本冗余、内存效率低、安全性保障不足等挑战，需要开发既能保证安全约束又能高效学习的强化学习框架。

Method: 提出SODACER框架：1) 双缓冲结构：Fast-Buffer快速适应近期经验，Slow-Buffer通过自组织自适应聚类保持多样非冗余历史经验；2) 集成控制屏障函数(CBFs)保证状态和输入约束安全；3) 结合Sophia优化器实现自适应二阶梯度更新。

Result: 在非线性HPV传播模型上验证，相比随机和聚类经验回放方法，SODACER实现更快收敛、更高样本效率、更优偏差-方差权衡，同时保持安全系统轨迹，Friedman检验验证了统计显著性。

Conclusion: SODACER-Sophia架构为动态安全关键环境提供可靠、有效、鲁棒的学习解决方案，在机器人、医疗保健和大规模系统优化等领域具有通用性，通过自适应聚类优化内存效率，同时保障安全性约束。

Abstract: This paper proposes a novel reinforcement learning framework, named Self-Organizing Dual-buffer Adaptive Clustering Experience Replay (SODACER), designed to achieve safe and scalable optimal control of nonlinear systems. The proposed SODACER mechanism consisting of a Fast-Buffer for rapid adaptation to recent experiences and a Slow-Buffer equipped with a self-organizing adaptive clustering mechanism to maintain diverse and non-redundant historical experiences. The adaptive clustering mechanism dynamically prunes redundant samples, optimizing memory efficiency while retaining critical environmental patterns. The approach integrates SODASER with Control Barrier Functions (CBFs) to guarantee safety by enforcing state and input constraints throughout the learning process. To enhance convergence and stability, the framework is combined with the Sophia optimizer, enabling adaptive second-order gradient updates. The proposed SODACER-Sophia's architecture ensures reliable, effective, and robust learning in dynamic, safety-critical environments, offering a generalizable solution for applications in robotics, healthcare, and large-scale system optimization. The proposed approach is validated on a nonlinear Human Papillomavirus (HPV) transmission model with multiple control inputs and safety constraints. Comparative evaluations against random and clustering-based experience replay methods demonstrate that SODACER achieves faster convergence, improved sample efficiency, and a superior bias-variance trade-off, while maintaining safe system trajectories, validated via the Friedman test.

</details>


### [306] [Modeling Descriptive Norms in Multi-Agent Systems: An Auto-Aggregation PDE Framework with Adaptive Perception Kernels](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06557)
*Chao Li,Ilia Derevitskii,Sergey Kovalchuk*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出基于PDE的自聚合模型，模拟自主多智能体系统中的描述性规范动态，通过非局部感知核和外部势场捕捉收敛与违反行为，应用于COVID-19数据集验证不同约束机制下的规范形成。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统规范动态模型通常依赖贝叶斯信念推断，难以直接建模智能体间的连续交互。本文旨在开发一个基于偏微分方程的框架，能够直接表示意见分布的连续性，避免信念猜测，更好地模拟真实世界中的规范形成过程。

Method: 扩展经典输运方程，将意见流行度建模为连续分布，引入非局部感知核实现智能体间的直接交互，使用外部势场作为约束机制。框架包含自上而下（临床指南约束）和自下而上（势场引导）两种实验设置。

Result: 在COVID-19医疗数据集上的实验表明：1）自上而下约束能有效生成与数据集一致的新描述性规范收敛；2）自下而上势场引导通过违反-重耦合成功重建与数据集对齐的规范；3）完全自主交互则产生独立于数据集的多中心规范结构。

Conclusion: 提出的PDE自聚合模型能够有效模拟描述性规范动态，验证了不同约束机制对规范形成的影响，为理解多智能体系统中规范演化提供了新的数学框架和实证支持。

Abstract: This paper presents a PDE-based auto-aggregation model for simulating descriptive norm dynamics in autonomous multi-agent systems, capturing convergence and violation through non-local perception kernels and external potential fields. Extending classical transport equations, the framework represents opinion popularity as a continuous distribution, enabling direct interactions without Bayesian guessing of beliefs. Applied to a real-world COVID-19 dataset from a major medical center, the experimental results demonstrate that: when clinical guidelines serve as a top-down constraint mechanism, it effectively generates convergence of novel descriptive norms consistent with the dataset; in the bottom-up experiment, potential field guidance successfully promotes the system's reconstruction of descriptive norms aligned with the dataset through violation-and-recoupling; whereas fully autonomous interaction leads to the emergence of multi-centric normative structures independent of the dataset.

</details>


### [307] [Robustness Quantification of MIMO-PI Controller From the Perspective of \(γ\)-Dissipativity](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06568)
*Zimao Sheng*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本文从耗散性理论角度研究MIMO-PI控制器的最优参数整定，为受扰非线性MIMO系统提供鲁棒稳定化理论基础。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统PID控制器及其变体通常依赖于平衡点线性化和经验参数整定，难以有效处理具有强耦合、强外部扰动和高非线性的MIMO系统。现有方法很少从现代鲁棒控制理论（如耗散性和L2增益）角度探索PID控制器对受扰非线性系统的内在稳定机制。

Method: 1. 将耗散性理论与Hamilton-Jacobi-Isaacs不等式结合，建立MIMO-PI控制系统实现γ-耗散性的充分条件，并量化原点附近局部区域的γ-耗散性程度。2. 提出最优参数整定策略，将γ-耗散性优化问题转化为标准特征值问题，进一步转换为线性矩阵不等式形式以便在线高效计算。

Result: 综合仿真实验验证了所提方法的有效性和最优性。该方法为一般受扰非线性MIMO系统的鲁棒稳定化提供了理论基础。

Conclusion: 本文从耗散性角度丰富了PID控制器的参数整定方法，为处理具有强耦合、强扰动和高非线性的MIMO系统提供了理论框架和实用工具。

Abstract: The proportional-integral-derivative (PID) controller and its variants are widely used in control engineering, but they often rely on linearization around equilibrium points and empirical parameter tuning, making them ineffective for multi-input-multi-output (MIMO) systems with strong coupling, intense external disturbances, and high nonlinearity. Moreover, existing methods rarely explore the intrinsic stabilization mechanism of PID controllers for disturbed nonlinear systems from the perspective of modern robust control theories such as dissipativity and $\mathcal{L}_2$-gain. To address this gap, this study focuses on $γ$-dissipativity (partially equivalent to $\mathcal{L}_2$-gain) and investigates the optimal parameter tuning of MIMO-PI controllers for general disturbed nonlinear MIMO systems. First, by integrating dissipativity theory with the Hamilton-Jacobi-Isaacs (HJI) inequality, sufficient conditions for the MIMO-PI-controlled system to achieve $γ$-dissipativity are established, and the degree of $γ$-dissipativity in a local region containing the origin is quantified. Second, an optimal parameter tuning strategy is proposed, which reformulates the $γ$-dissipativity optimization problem into a class of standard eigenvalue problems (EVPs) and further converts it into linear matrix inequality (LMI) formulations for efficient online computation. Comprehensive simulation experiments validate the effectiveness and optimality of the proposed approach. This work provides a theoretical basis for the robust stabilization of general disturbed nonlinear MIMO systems and enriches the parameter tuning methods of PID controllers from the perspective of dissipativity.

</details>


### [308] [A Power Electronic Converter Control Framework Based on Graph Neural Networks - An Early Proof-of-Concept](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06686)
*Darius Jakobeit,Oliver Wallscheid*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出一种拓扑无关的电力电子变换器元控制框架，使用图神经网络和分布式控制头，通过可微分预测控制进行端到端训练，在随机采样的降压变换器上实现接近最优的跟踪性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统电力电子变换器控制通常针对特定拓扑进行调优，限制了在不同异构设计间的迁移能力。需要一种能够跨多种拓扑结构工作的通用控制框架。

Method: 将变换器网表编码为类型化二分图，使用任务条件化的图神经网络骨干网络和分布式控制头，通过可微分预测控制进行端到端训练，在变换器参数和参考跟踪任务的分布上摊销约束最优控制。

Result: 在随机采样的降压变换器仿真中，学习到的控制器相对于在线最优控制基准实现了接近最优的跟踪性能。

Conclusion: 该方法为电力电子变换器控制提供了一种拓扑无关的解决方案，为扩展到更广泛的拓扑结构、控制目标和实时部署奠定了基础。

Abstract: Power electronic converter control is typically tuned per topology, limiting transfer across heterogeneous designs. This letter proposes a topology-agnostic meta-control framework that encodes converter netlists as typed bipartite graphs and uses a task-conditioned graph neural network backbone with distributed control heads. The policy is trained end-to-end via differentiable predictive control to amortize constrained optimal control over a distribution of converter parameters and reference-tracking tasks. In simulation on randomly sampled buck converters, the learned controller achieves near-optimal tracking performance relative to an online optimal-control baseline, motivating future extension to broader topologies, objectives, and real-time deployment.

</details>


### [309] [Entropy-based Thermal Sensor Placement and Temperature Reconstruction based on Adaptive Compressive Sensing Theory](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06740)
*Kun-Chih,Chen,Chia-Hsin Chen,Lei-Qi Wang,Chun-Chieh Wang*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出基于熵的传感器布局和自适应压缩感知方法，显著提升多核系统全芯片温度重构精度和硬件效率


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决多核系统中热传感器布局和全芯片温度重构的挑战，为高性能多核系统提供更有效的动态温度管理方案

Method: 采用基于熵的传感器布局策略选择能捕捉多样化热行为的传感器位置，结合自适应压缩感知方法动态调整测量矩阵

Result: 全芯片温度重构误差降低18%-95%，硬件效率相比相关工作提升5%-514%

Conclusion: 该方法为未来高性能多核系统提供了更有效的动态温度管理潜力

Abstract: This paper addresses the challenges of thermal sensor allocation and full-chip temperature reconstruction in multi-core systems by leveraging an entropy-based sensor placement strategy and an adaptive compressive sensing approach. By selecting sensor locations that capture diverse thermal behaviors and dynamically adjusting the measurement matrix, our method significantly enhances the accuracy of the full-chip temperature reconstruction. Experimental results demonstrate that our approach reduces full-chip temperature reconstruction error by 18% to 95%. In addition to the full-chip temperature reconstruction efficiency enhancement, our proposed method improves hardware efficiency by 5% to 514% over the related works. These findings highlight the potential of our method for more effective dynamic temperature management in future high-performance multi-core systems.

</details>


### [310] [Control and Stability of a Multilevel Power System for a Future Distribution Network](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06766)
*Xian Wu,Jan H. van Schuppen,Hai Xiang Lin*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出多级控制框架，利用储能系统作为功率缓冲器来缓解可再生能源接入配电网引起的频率和电压波动，采用分布式线性二次调节器控制策略降低通信开销。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 可再生能源在配电网中的日益集成带来了频率和电压稳定性挑战，因为其间歇性和低惯量特性会导致电网波动。

Method: 建立非线性互联模型描述配电网多级复杂动态，开发分布式线性二次调节器控制策略，采用自下而上的信息交换方式，每级在短时域内实施本地反馈控制。

Result: 通过李雅普诺夫分析建立了开环和闭环系统的稳定性条件，推导了分布式策略与集中控制方法之间最优差异的显式性能边界，证明了框架的有效性。

Conclusion: 所提出的多级控制框架能够有效缓解可再生能源集成带来的频率和电压波动问题，分布式策略在降低通信开销的同时保持了良好的控制性能。

Abstract: The growing integration of renewable energy sources into distribution networks poses significant challenges to frequency and voltage stability due to their intermittent nature and low-inertia dynamics. This paper proposes a multilevel control framework for a future decarbonized power system, using energy storage systems as power buffers to mitigate frequency and voltage fluctuations. A nonlinear interconnected model is formulated to characterize the complex dynamics across multiple levels of the distribution network. To reduce operational complexity and communication overhead of these dynamics, a distributed linear quadratic regulator control strategy is developed for information exchange in a bottom-up approach, where each level implements local feedback control within a short time horizon. Stability conditions for both open-loop and closed-loop systems are established using Lyapunov-based analysis. In addition, explicit performance bounds are derived to quantify the optimal difference between the proposed distributed strategy and the centralized control method, demonstrating the effectiveness of the proposed framework.

</details>


### [311] [Fast frequency response with heterogeneous communication delay management under the SCION Internet architecture](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06879)
*Jialun Zhang,Felix Kottmann,Jimmy Chih-Hsien Peng,Adrian Perrig,Gabriela Hug*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出基于SCION互联网架构的实时备用调度框架，优化选择分布式能源和可控负荷组合提供快速频率响应服务，通过通信-物理协同优化降低延迟并提高计算效率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统BGP互联网架构难以保证延迟敏感的频率控制服务质量，而专用网络成本高昂。SCION架构支持最小延迟路径选择，适合快速频率响应等延迟敏感服务。

Method: 1) 推导考虑异构通信延迟的系统频率动态分析表达式；2) 建立通信-物理协同优化模型，联合调度通信路径和物理灵活性资源；3) 提出启发式FFR分配算法近似最优响应组合，集成DERs和CLs贡献。

Result: 数值案例研究表明，所提算法能够近似最优备用分配，同时显著减少计算时间，验证了基于SCION架构的实时频率响应调度框架的有效性。

Conclusion: SCION互联网架构为延迟敏感的快速频率响应服务提供了可行解决方案，所提协同优化框架和启发式算法能够有效调度分布式资源，在保证服务质量的同时降低通信成本。

Abstract: System operators can increasingly exploit distributed energy resources (DERs) and controllable loads (CLs) to provide frequency response services. In conventional practice, communication between the system operator and flexible devices relies on the Border Gateway Protocol (BGP)-based Internet. However, existing BGP-based architectures face challenges in providing latency-guaranteed control, while direct private and proprietary communication networks lead to additional deployment and maintenance costs. In contrast, the SCION-based Internet architecture supports latency-minimum path selection, which makes it suitable for latency-sensitive frequency contingency services such as fast frequency response (FFR). Hence, this paper proposes a real-time reserve dispatch framework to optimally select a portfolio of flexible devices to deliver FFR services using the SCION-based Internet. First, an analytical expression of the system frequency dynamics with respect to heterogeneous communication latencies is derived. Next, a cyber-physical co-optimization model is formulated to jointly schedule communication paths and physical flexibility resources for real-time FFR provision. To improve the computation efficiency, we propose a heuristic FFR allocation algorithm to approximate the optimal response portfolio, integrating contributions from both DERs and CLs. Numerical case studies demonstrate the benefits of the proposed algorithm and its capability to approximate the optimality of the reserves allocation while significantly reducing the computation time.

</details>


### [312] [Hardware-in-the-loop wind-tunnel testing of wake interactions between two floating wind turbines](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06964)
*Alessandro Fontanella,Kristjan Milic,Alan Facchinetti,Sara Muggiasca,Marco Belloli*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出硬件在环风洞方法研究浮式风机尾流相互作用，考虑气动载荷与平台动力学的全耦合


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有浮式风电场尾流相互作用研究大多忽略平台运动与气动载荷的双向耦合，通常采用预设平台运动的方式，需要更真实的实验方法

Method: 采用硬件在环风洞方法，结合两个缩比转子的物理风洞测试与实时数值模型，模型包含平台运动、系泊恢复力和水动力载荷

Result: 下游风机在上游风机尾流中运行时，由于入流速度降低，平均推力和平台偏转减小；同时尾流中湍流能量增加导致低频平台运动增强

Conclusion: 硬件在环框架为研究尾流诱导激励机制提供了受控实验基础，支持浮式风电场模型和控制策略的验证

Abstract: Wake interactions in floating wind farms are inherently coupled to platform motion, yet most experimental studies to date neglect this two-way coupling by prescribing platform movements. This work presents a hardware-in-the-loop (HIL) wind-tunnel methodology to investigate wake interactions between two floating wind turbines with fully coupled aerodynamic loading and platform dynamics. The approach integrates physical wind-tunnel testing of two scaled rotors with a real-time numerical model that accounts for platform motion, mooring restoring forces, and hydrodynamic loads. Experiments conducted under low-turbulence inflow conditions show that a downstream turbine operating in the wake of an upstream turbine experiences reduced mean thrust and platform deflections due to the decreased inflow velocity, alongside enhanced low-frequency platform motions driven by increased turbulent energy in the wake. The proposed HIL framework provides a controlled experimental basis for studying wake-induced excitation mechanisms and supports the validation of floating wind farm models and control strategies.

</details>


### [313] [Next-Generation Grid Codes: Toward a New Paradigm for Dynamic Ancillary Services](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07090)
*Verena Häberle,Kehao Zhuang,Xiuqiang He,Linbin Huang,Florian Dörfler*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出基于分散式稳定性和性能认证的下一代电网规范概念框架，通过频域证书保证闭环稳定性和明确性能边界


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为现代电力系统开发下一代电网规范提供理论基础，解决动态辅助服务的稳定性和性能认证问题

Method: 采用环路变换和无源性方法生成局部频域证书，通过频域约束推导时域性能定量边界，非参数化且模型无关

Result: 建立了分散式验证框架，能够保证闭环稳定性并提供频率/电压动态的关键性能指标定量边界

Conclusion: 为未来电网规范和控制设计方法提供了统一的理论起点，适用于广泛的设备动态且无需显式参数化

Abstract: This paper presents preliminary results toward a conceptual foundation for Next Generation Grid Codes (NGGCs) based on decentralized stability and performance certification for dynamic ancillary services. The proposed NGGC framework targets two core outcomes: (i) guaranteed closed-loop stability and (ii) explicit performance assurances for power-system frequency and voltage dynamics. Stability is addressed using loop-shifting and passivity-based methods that yield local frequency-domain certificates for individual devices, enabling fully decentralized verification of the interconnected system. Performance is characterized by deriving quantitative bounds on key time-domain metrics (e.g., nadirs, rate-of-change-of-frequency (RoCoF), steady-state deviations, and oscillation damping) through frequency-domain constraints on local device behavior. The framework is non-parametric and model-agnostic, accommodating a broad class of device dynamics under mild assumptions, and provides an initial unified approach to stability and performance certification without explicit device-model parameterization. As such, these results offer a principled starting point for the development of future grid codes and control design methodologies in modern power systems.

</details>


### [314] [Digital Twin for Ultra-Reliable & Low-Latency 6G Wireless Communications in Dense Urban City](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07132)
*Abdikarim Mohamed Ibrahim,Rosdiadee Nordin*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 使用Sunway City的几何数字孪生模型研究毫米波多站点部署的服务性能，通过GPU加速射线追踪分析覆盖、干扰和可达速率，发现密集城区中毫米波形成窄高速走廊但阴影严重，双连接可提升URLLC可靠性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 高频段在密集城市部署规划困难，因为覆盖、干扰和服务可靠性对局部形态敏感。传统分析模型和昂贵测量活动难以全面评估，需要数字孪生技术来研究毫米波部署的服务影响。

Method: 构建Sunway City的几何数字孪生模型，使用Blender组装地理参考的三维建筑、道路和开放区域网格。在模型中嵌入7个10GHz下行发射器，使用GPU加速射线追踪引擎计算密集用户位置网格上的路径增益和SINR场，映射为可达吞吐量并与XR、V2X和URLLC目标速率比较。

Result: 有利街道和庭院形成狭窄高速走廊，但被深阴影包围。基线部署中仅20%模拟区域能维持100Mbps URLLC速率，不到10%小区能达到1.7Gbps XR速率。宏分集分析显示大多数URLLC可行小区有数分贝SINR余量，可通过双连接利用。

Conclusion: 城市数字孪生能将射线追踪输出转化为服务中心指标和规划洞察，补充分析模型和昂贵测量活动，为高频段城市部署提供有效评估工具。

Abstract: High-frequency deployments in dense cities are difficult to plan because coverage, interference, and service reliability depend sensitively on local morphology. This paper develops a geometric Digital Twin (DT) of the Sunway City and uses it to study the service implications of a multi-site mmWave deployment. The DT is constructed from geo-referenced three-dimensional meshes of buildings, roads, and open areas, assembled in Blender and exported as a mesh scene. A seven-transmitter downlink at 10 GHz is then embedded into this geometry and evaluated using a GPU accelerated ray tracing engine that returns path-gain and Signal-to-Interference-plus-Noise Ratio (SINR) fields over a dense grid of user locations. These fields are mapped to achievable throughput and compared against representative target rates for immersive extended reality (XR), vehicle-to-everything (V2X) services, and ultra-reliable low-latency communication (URLLC). The resulting maps show that favourable streets and courtyards form narrow high rate corridors surrounded by deep shadows, even within a dense area. In the baseline deployment, one fifth of the simulated area can maintain 100 Mbps URLLC rates, and less than 10% of cells can reach 1.7 Gbps for XR, despite the presence of several rooftop sites. By exploiting the DT, we further quantify the macro-diversity margin between the best and second best serving sites and show that most URLLC-feasible cells have several decibels of SINR headroom that could be harvested through dual connectivity. The study shows how a city DT can translate ray tracing output into service centric metrics and planning insights, complementing both analytical models and expensive measurement campaigns.

</details>


### [315] [Geometry-Aware LoRaWAN Gateway Placement in Dense Urban Cities Using Digital Twins](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07133)
*Abdikarim Mohamed Ibrahim,Rosdiadee Nordin*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该论文提出使用数字孪生和GPU加速射线追踪来优化城市环境中LoRaWAN网关的部署，通过精确的3D城市模型和实际链路预算评估网关覆盖效果。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前LoRaWAN部署依赖粗略的距离估计或简化的传播模型，导致运营商对屋顶选择、街道和建筑物阴影对覆盖和可靠性的综合影响缺乏了解，需要更精确的规划工具。

Method: 结合几何精确的数字孪生和GPU加速射线追踪引擎，使用ITU无线电材料参数，在8个候选屋顶上评估RAK7289 WisGate Edge Pro网关，基于数据手册推导sub-GHz链路预算，在5米网格上获取SNR，计算覆盖指标并应用贪心最大覆盖算法进行站点排序。

Result: 单个屋顶网关仅能覆盖数字孪生模型的五分之一区域（在稳健SNR阈值下），即使部署6个站点，周围住宅街道仍存在大量单网关覆盖或覆盖盲区。

Conclusion: 数字孪生和射线追踪工具能够帮助网络运营商弥合昂贵实际试验与规划之间的差距，确定计划中的LoRaWAN网关是否足够或是否需要额外站点。

Abstract: LoRaWAN deployments rely on rough range estimates or simplified propagation models to decide where to place/mount gateways. As a result, operators have limited visibility into how rooftop choice, streets, and building shadowing jointly affect coverage and reliability. This paper addresses the problem of gateway placement in dense urban environments by combining a geometry accurate Digital Twin (DT) with a GPU accelerated ray tracing engine. Existing studies optimize placement on abstract grids or tune models with sparse measurements; few works evaluate LoRaWAN gateways on a full 3D city model using a realistic link budget. In this paper, we develop a DT with ITU radio materials and evaluate eight candidate rooftops for RAK7289 WisGate Edge Pro gateways under a sub-GHz link budget derived from the data sheet. For each rooftop, we obtain Signal-to-Noise Ratios (SNR) on a 5 meter grid, derive robust and edge coverage indicators, and apply a greedy maximum coverage algorithm to rank sites and quantify the benefit of incremental densification. Results show that a single rooftop gateway covers one fifth of the full Sunway twin (i.e., the DT) at a robust SNR threshold, and that six sites still leave large areas of single gateway or out of coverage cells in surrounding residential streets. The findings from this paper shows that DT and ray tracing tools enable network operators to bridge the gap of expensive real-world trials and planning to identify if the planned LoRaWAN gateway is sufficient or additional sites are required.

</details>


### [316] [Analysis, detection and control of secure and safe cyber-physical control systems in a unified framework](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07150)
*Linlin Li,Steven X. Ding,Maiying Zhong,Dong Zhao,Yang Shi*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种统一框架，用于网络物理控制系统的分析、故障与攻击同时检测、容错控制和攻击弹性控制，基于系统互质分解和Bezout恒等式。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有研究发现基于输入残差信号的攻击检测器能可靠检测攻击，且攻击和系统不确定性作用于不同的系统子空间，这促使作者探索在统一框架下实现安全可靠的网络物理控制系统。

Method: 提出基于系统互质分解和Bezout恒等式的统一框架，在系统输入-输出数据子空间中统一处理控制和检测问题，重新审视现有攻击检测和弹性控制方案，并开发新的控制理论范式。

Result: 建立了一个控制理论范式，能够在统一框架下解决网络物理控制系统的分析、故障与攻击同时检测、容错控制和攻击弹性控制问题。

Conclusion: 通过基于互质分解的统一框架，能够系统地处理网络物理控制系统的安全与可靠性问题，为同时应对故障和攻击提供了理论基础。

Abstract: This paper deals with analysis, simultaneous detection of faults and attacks, fault-tolerant control and attack-resilient of cyber-physical control systems. In our recent work, it has been observed that an attack detector driven by an input residual signal is capable of reliably detecting attacks. In particular, observing system dynamics from the perspective of the system input-output signal space reveals that attacks and system uncertainties act on different system subspaces. These results motivate our exploration of secure and safe cyber-physical control systems in the unified framework of control and detection. The unified framework is proposed to handle control and detection issues uniformly and in subspaces of system input-output data. Its mathematical and control-theoretic basis is system coprime factorizations with Bezout identity at its core. We firstly explore those methods and schemes of the unified framework, which serve as the major control-theoretic tool in our work. It is followed by re-visiting and examining established attack detection and resilient control schemes. The major part of our work is the endeavours to develop a control-theoretic paradigm, in which analysis, simultaneous detection of faults and attacks, fault-tolerant and attack-resilient control of cyber-physical control systems are addressed in a unified manner.

</details>


### [317] [Nonlinear Observer Design for Visual-Inertial Odometry](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07156)
*Mouaad Boughellaba,Abdelhamid Tayebi,James R. Forbes,Soulaimane Berkane*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出了一种基于矩阵李群SE_{3+n}(3)的视觉惯性里程计非线性几何观测器，通过解耦旋转和平移动态实现几乎全局渐近稳定，优于传统EKF方法的局部收敛性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统基于扩展卡尔曼滤波的视觉惯性里程计方法依赖于局部线性化，只能保证局部收敛性。需要一种能够实现几乎全局稳定性的几何框架，以提升VIO系统的鲁棒性和一致性。

Method: 引入新的矩阵李群结构SE_{3+n}(3)，统一姿态、重力、线速度和地标位置。设计级联观测器：全局指数稳定的Riccati平移动态观测器 + 几乎全局输入到状态稳定的姿态观测器，通过解耦旋转和平移动态实现几乎全局渐近稳定。

Result: 在EuRoC MAV数据集上进行了数值仿真和实验验证，证明了该方法能够鲁棒且一致地估计扩展状态（姿态、位置、速度、重力、地标位置），仅受VIO不可观测方向（全局平移和绕重力旋转）的限制。

Conclusion: 提出的基于SE_{3+n}(3)李群的级联非线性几何观测器实现了几乎全局渐近稳定性，优于传统EKF方法，适用于实际VIO应用，具有鲁棒性和一致性优势。

Abstract: This paper addresses the problem of Visual-Inertial Odometry (VIO) for rigid body systems evolving in three-dimensional space. We introduce a novel matrix Lie group structure, denoted SE_{3+n}(3), that unifies the pose, gravity, linear velocity, and landmark positions within a consistent geometric framework tailored to the VIO problem. Building upon this formulation, we design an almost globally asymptotically stable nonlinear geometric observer that tightly integrates data from an Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) and visual sensors. Unlike conventional Extended Kalman Filter (EKF)-based estimators that rely on local linearization and thus ensure only local convergence, the proposed observer achieves almost global stability through the decoupling of the rotational and translational dynamics. A globally exponentially stable Riccati-based translational observer along with an almost global input-to-state stable attitude observer are designed such that the overall cascaded observer enjoys almost global asymptotic stability. This cascaded architecture guarantees robust and consistent estimation of the extended state, including orientation, position, velocity, gravity, and landmark positions, up to the VIO unobservable directions (i.e., a global translation and rotation about gravity). The effectiveness of the proposed scheme is demonstrated through numerical simulations as well as experimental validation on the EuRoC MAV dataset, highlighting its robustness and suitability for real-world VIO applications.

</details>


### [318] [Stochastic Power-Water Coordination: Unlocking Flexibility in Hybrid RO Desalination Plants via Variable-Speed Pumps and Tank Mixing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07295)
*Rongxing Hu,Charalambos Konstantinou*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出一个协调电力系统与海水淡化厂的运行框架，通过详细建模淡化厂特性并主动管理淡水存储和盐度，显著提升淡化厂灵活性，采用MILP模型和分解随机优化方法，可降低6%运行成本。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 海水淡化厂是水资源稀缺地区的关键基础设施和主要电力负荷，虽然反渗透技术最节能但仍耗能巨大，但具有为电力系统提供灵活性的潜力。需要开发协调运行框架来充分释放淡化厂的灵活性。

Method: 开发详细的淡化厂模型，包含变频高压泵特性、启停操作与冲洗要求、水质约束、储水罐水动力和盐混合等。通过主动管理淡水存储和储罐盐度，在闭环协调调度框架中显著增强淡化厂灵活性。通过适当简化和线性化，将协调调度问题构建为可处理的混合整数线性规划模型，并提出两步分解的承诺-调度随机优化方法处理不确定性。

Result: 案例研究验证了所提方法的有效性，展示了高达6%的运行成本降低。

Conclusion: 该研究提出的协调运行框架能够充分释放海水淡化厂的灵活性潜力，通过详细建模和主动管理策略，在考虑不确定性的情况下实现电力系统和淡化厂的高效协同运行，显著降低系统运行成本。

Abstract: Water desalination plants (DPs) are among the most critical infrastructures and largest electricity loads in water-scarce regions worldwide. Although reverse osmosis (RO) desalination is the most energy-efficient and dominant technology, it remains energy-intensive but can offer substantial flexibility potential for power systems. This paper proposes a coordinated operation framework for power systems and DPs that explicitly accounts for both systems' operational constraints and fully unlocks DP flexibility. To achieve this, a detailed DP model is developed, incorporating the characteristics of an actual high-pressure pump with variable-speed operation, on-off operation with flushing requirements, water quality constraints, and water dynamics and salt mixing in the storage tank. By proactively managing freshwater storage and tank salinity in a closed-loop coordinated scheduling framework, the operational flexibility of the DP is significantly enhanced. With appropriate simplification and linearization, the resulting coordinated scheduling problem is formulated as a tractable mixed-integer linear programming (MILP) model, and a two-step decomposed commitment-scheduling stochastic optimization (TDCSO) is proposed to efficiently address uncertainties. Case studies validate the proposed approach and demonstrate up to a 6% operating cost reduction.

</details>


### [319] [Energy-efficient torque allocation for straight-line driving of electric vehicles based on pseudoconvex polynomials](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07527)
*Josip Kir Hromatko,Šandor Ileš,Branimir Škugor,Joško Deur*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出基于高阶多项式近似电机损耗的电动汽车多电机扭矩分配方法，通过SOS规划保证多项式模型的单调性和正定性，实现实时优化并降低能耗


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 多电机电动汽车在满足驾驶员扭矩需求方面具有灵活性，需要通过扭矩分配来最小化电池能耗，但现有方法在计算效率和鲁棒性方面存在不足

Method: 使用具有特定性质的高阶多项式近似电机损耗，通过平方和规划施加单调性和正定性约束，将扭矩分配问题构建为约束非线性优化问题并用现有求解器高效求解

Result: 在多个认证驾驶循环中与基于网格搜索的基准方法对比，结果显示对电能消耗有适度改善，同时支持实时优化并能与其他车辆控制系统集成

Conclusion: 提出的基于多项式近似的扭矩分配方法在保持计算效率的同时提供了鲁棒性，能够实现实时优化并与其他控制系统集成，为多电机电动汽车的能耗优化提供了有效解决方案

Abstract: Electric vehicles with multiple motors provide a flexibility in meeting the driver torque demand, which calls for minimizing the battery energy consumption through torque allocation. In this paper, we present an approach to this problem based on approximating electric motor losses using higher-order polynomials with specific properties. To ensure a well-behaved optimization landscape, monotonicity and positivity constraints are imposed on the polynomial models using sum of squares programming. This methodology provides robustness against noisy or sparse data, while retaining the computational efficiency of a polynomial function approximation. The torque allocation problem based on such polynomials is formulated as a constrained nonlinear optimization problem and solved efficiently using readily available solvers. In the nominal case, the first-order necessary conditions for optimality can also be used to obtain a global solution. The performance of the proposed method is evaluated on several certification driving cycles against a grid search-based benchmark. Results show a modest influence on electric energy consumption, while enabling real-time optimization and integration with other vehicle control systems.

</details>


### [320] [Recursive Binary Identification with Differential Privacy and Data Tampering Attacks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07608)
*Jimin Wang,Jieming Ke,Jin Guo,Yanlong Zhao*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出在带宽受限、不安全的传感器网络中，结合差分隐私和递归投影算法进行参数估计，能抵抗窃听和数据篡改攻击，保证收敛性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传感器网络在带宽受限且不安全的无线环境中传输数据时，面临窃听和数据篡改的双重安全威胁，需要同时保护隐私和保证估计精度。

Method: 采用差分隐私保护敏感信息抵御窃听，提出递归投影算法处理量化测量、差分隐私和数据篡改攻击，保证几乎必然收敛和均方收敛。

Result: 算法在存在量化、隐私保护和攻击的情况下仍能收敛，分析了有/无隐私保护的收敛速率，并将方法扩展到多智能体系统的分布式算法。

Conclusion: 提出的框架能有效应对传感器网络中的安全威胁，在保护隐私的同时保证参数估计的收敛性，仿真验证了算法的有效性。

Abstract: In this paper, we consider the parameter estimation in a bandwidth-constrained sensor network communicating through an insecure medium. The sensor performs a local quantization, and transmits a 1-bit message to an estimation center through a wireless medium where the transmission of information is vulnerable to attackers. Both eavesdroppers and data tampering attackers are considered in our setting. A differential privacy method is used to protect the sensitive information against eavesdroppers. Then, a recursive projection algorithm is proposed such that the estimation center achieves the almost sure convergence and mean-square convergence when quantized measurements, differential privacy, and data tampering attacks are considered in a uniform framework. A privacy analysis including the convergence rate with privacy or without privacy is given. Further, we extend the problem to multi-agent systems. For this case, a distributed recursive projection algorithm is proposed with guaranteed almost sure and mean square convergence. A simulation example is provided to illustrate the effectiveness of the proposed algorithms.

</details>


### [321] [Studying the Role of Synthetic Data for Machine Learning-based Wireless Networks Traffic Forecasting](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07646)
*José Pulido,Francesc Wilhelmi,Sergio Fortes,Alfonso Fernández-Durán,Lorenzo Galati Giordano,Raquel Barco*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出基于一阶自回归噪声统计的Wi-Fi合成数据生成方法，仅需少量真实数据即可生成统计丰富的流量模式，在Wi-Fi流量预测中效果接近真实数据且泛化能力更强。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 合成数据生成是增强和丰富数据集的重要工具，不仅能以低成本构建健壮的AI/ML数据集，还能提供隐私友好的解决方案，避免存储大量数据的复杂性。特别是在大规模Wi-Fi部署中，需要一种高效的数据生成方法。

Method: 提出基于一阶自回归噪声统计的合成数据生成方法，该方法仅需少量真实数据即可运行，同时生成统计丰富的流量模式，能有效模拟真实接入点行为。

Result: 实验结果显示：1）在相同AP上训练时，使用合成数据训练的ML模型MAE值比使用真实数据训练的模型高10-15；2）合成数据训练的模型泛化能力更强，预测准确率比真实数据训练的基线提高达50%；3）所需训练数据量显著减少。

Conclusion: 该方法弥合了合成数据生成与实际Wi-Fi流量预测之间的差距，为现代无线网络提供了可扩展、高效且实时的解决方案，合成数据通过增强生成轨迹的变异性和多样性提高了模型性能。

Abstract: Synthetic data generation is an appealing tool for augmenting and enriching datasets, playing a crucial role in advancing artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML). Not only does synthetic data help build robust AI/ML datasets cost-effectively, but it also offers privacy-friendly solutions and bypasses the complexities of storing large data volumes. This paper proposes a novel method to generate synthetic data, based on first-order auto-regressive noise statistics, for large-scale Wi-Fi deployments. The approach operates with minimal real data requirements while producing statistically rich traffic patterns that effectively mimic real Access Point (AP) behavior. Experimental results show that ML models trained on synthetic data achieve Mean Absolute Error (MAE) values within 10 to 15 of those obtained using real data when trained on the same APs, while requiring significantly less training data. Moreover, when generalization is required, synthetic-data-trained models improve prediction accuracy by up to 50 percent compared to real-data-trained baselines, thanks to the enhanced variability and diversity of the generated traces. Overall, the proposed method bridges the gap between synthetic data generation and practical Wi-Fi traffic forecasting, providing a scalable, efficient, and real-time solution for modern wireless networks.

</details>


### [322] [Learning to accelerate Krasnosel'skii-Mann fixed-point iterations with guarantees](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07665)
*Andrea Martin,Giuseppe Belgioioso*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出一种基于学习的优化框架，通过向Krasnosel'skii-Mann迭代注入可求和扰动来改进固定点问题的平均性能，同时保持收敛性保证。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统固定点问题求解方法在特定问题分布上的平均性能可能不是最优的，需要一种既能保持理论收敛保证又能提升实际性能的框架。

Method: 在标准Krasnosel'skii-Mann迭代中故意注入可求和扰动，通过参数化学习优化扰动策略，在度量次正则性假设下保证局部线性收敛。

Result: 证明了该参数化包含所有局部线性收敛的迭代（达到可忽略的偏差项），并能加速多种算子分裂方法，在Douglas-Rachford分裂算法上验证了有效性。

Conclusion: 该学习优化框架为固定点问题提供了理论保证与实际性能提升的统一方法，能有效加速结构化单调包含问题的求解。

Abstract: We introduce a principled learning to optimize (L2O) framework for solving fixed-point problems involving general nonexpansive mappings. Our idea is to deliberately inject summable perturbations into a standard Krasnosel'skii-Mann iteration to improve its average-case performance over a specific distribution of problems while retaining its convergence guarantees. Under a metric sub-regularity assumption, we prove that the proposed parametrization includes only iterations that locally achieve linear convergence-up to a vanishing bias term-and that it encompasses all iterations that do so at a sufficiently fast rate. We then demonstrate how our framework can be used to augment several widely-used operator splitting methods to accelerate the solution of structured monotone inclusion problems, and validate our approach on a best approximation problem using an L2O-augmented Douglas-Rachford splitting algorithm.

</details>


### [323] [Safe Navigation under Uncertain Obstacle Dynamics using Control Barrier Functions and Constrained Convex Generators](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07715)
*Hugo Matias,Daniel Silvestre*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出基于采样数据的控制屏障函数框架，结合集值状态估计实现不确定线性动态障碍物环境下的安全导航


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决在不确定线性动态障碍物环境中，如何将集值状态估计（CCG）转换为控制屏障函数（CBF）以实现安全导航的问题

Method: 使用约束凸生成器（CCG）进行集值状态估计，通过凸优化将CCG估计转换为CBF，然后合并为单一CBF用于二次规划安全控制器设计

Result: 提出了一种将CCG估计转换为CBF的有效方法，能够处理刚体代理和任意几何形状，仿真验证了方法的有效性

Conclusion: 该框架成功将CCG集值估计与CBF安全过滤相结合，为不确定动态障碍物环境下的安全导航提供了通用解决方案

Abstract: This paper presents a sampled-data framework for the safe navigation of controlled agents in environments cluttered with obstacles governed by uncertain linear dynamics. Collision-free motion is achieved by combining Control Barrier Function (CBF)-based safety filtering with set-valued state estimation using Constrained Convex Generators (CCGs). At each sampling time, a CCG estimate of each obstacle is obtained using a finite-horizon guaranteed estimation scheme and propagated over the sampling interval to obtain a CCG-valued flow that describes the estimated obstacle evolution. However, since CCGs are defined indirectly - as an affine transformation of a generator set subject to equality constraints, rather than as a sublevel set of a scalar function - converting the estimated obstacle flows into CBFs is a nontrivial task. One of the main contributions of this paper is a procedure to perform this conversion, ultimately yielding a CBF via a convex optimization problem whose validity is established by the Implicit Function Theorem. The resulting obstacle-specific CBFs are then merged into a single CBF that is used to design a safe controller through the standard Quadratic Program (QP)-based approach. Since CCGs support Minkowski sums, the proposed framework also naturally handles rigid-body agents and generalizes existing CBF-based rigid-body navigation designs to arbitrary agent and obstacle geometries. While the main contribution is general, the paper primarily focuses on agents with first-order control-affine dynamics and second-order strict-feedback dynamics. Simulation examples demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed method.

</details>


### [324] [Predefined-time One-Shot Cooperative Estimation, Guidance, and Control for Simultaneous Target Interception](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07744)
*Lohitvel Gopikannan,Shashi Ranjan Kumar,Abhinav Sinha*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出一个统一的非线性估计-制导-控制框架，用于在异构感知拓扑下实现多拦截器对静止目标的协同同时拦截，其中只有部分拦截器配备导引头，其余通过信息交换间接获取目标信息。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决异构感知拓扑下的协同拦截问题，其中只有部分拦截器配备导引头（感知能力不均），需要设计一个统一的框架来处理部分可观测性、协同制导和精确控制。

Method: 1) 使用预定时间分布式观测器处理部分可观测性；2) 采用改进的剩余时间估计和预定时间一致性协议实现协同制导；3) 使用预定时间收敛滑模控制律生成舵偏指令，实现自动驾驶仪精确跟踪。
