Result: 通过数值仿真验证了估计精度、协同拦截性能和自动驾驶仪响应，理论保证得到支持，能够在设计指定时间内实现目标状态估计收敛、剩余时间一致性和精确加速度跟踪。

Conclusion: 提出的统一框架成功解决了异构感知拓扑下的协同同时拦截问题，通过预定时间收敛设计确保了系统性能的确定性时间界限，同时保持了整体设计的非奇异性。

Abstract: This work develops a unified nonlinear estimation-guidance-control framework for cooperative simultaneous interception of a stationary target under a heterogeneous sensing topology, where sensing capabilities are non-uniform across interceptors. Specifically, only a subset of agents is instrumented with onboard seekers (informed/seeker-equipped agents), whereas the rest of them (seeker-less agents) acquire the information about the target indirectly via the informed agents and execute a distributed cooperative guidance for simultaneous target interception. To address the resulting partial observability, a predefined-time distributed observer is leveraged, guaranteeing convergence of the target state estimates for seeker-less agents through information exchange with seeker-equipped neighbors over a directed communication graph. Thereafter, an improved time-to-go estimate accounting for wide launch envelopes is utilized to design the distributed cooperative guidance commands. This estimate is coupled with a predefined-time consensus protocol, ensuring consensus in the agents' time-to-go values. The temporal upper bounds within which both observer error and time-to-go consensus error converge to zero can be prescribed as design parameters. Furthermore, the cooperative guidance commands are realized by means of an autopilot, wherein the interceptor is steered by canard actuation. The corresponding fin deflection commands are generated using a predefined-time convergent sliding mode control law. This enables the autopilot to precisely track the commanded lateral acceleration within a design-specified time, while maintaining non-singularity of the overall design. Theoretical guarantees are supported by numerical simulations across diverse engagement geometries, verifying the estimation accuracy, the cooperative interception performance, and the autopilot response using the proposed scheme.

</details>


### [325] [Affordable Data Collection System for UAVs Taxi Vibration Testing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07783)
*Chaoyi Lin Yang,Gabriele Dessena,Oscar E. Bonilla-Manrique*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 开发低成本、自制的加速度数据采集系统，用于航空航天结构振动测试，通过小型固定翼无人机验证其可靠性


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 商业数据采集系统价格昂贵且复杂，限制了小型研究和实验应用的可及性，需要开发低成本替代方案

Method: 集成多个OrangePi 3 LTS单板计算机和LSM6DS3TR-C MEMS惯性测量单元，采用I2C通信接口和Python主从架构，以约208Hz采样率采集数据，使用Welch方法进行功率谱密度估计

Result: 系统能够提供一致的多传感器加速度数据和可重复的功率谱密度曲线，在相同测试条件下表现出可靠性

Conclusion: 开发的DAQ系统总硬件成本低于600欧元，为航空航天振动分析和结构测试提供了紧凑、可扩展且经济高效的替代方案

Abstract: Structural vibration testing plays a key role in aerospace engineering for evaluating dynamic behaviour, ensuring reliability and verifying structural integrity. These tests rely on accurate and robust data acquisition systems (DAQ) to capture high-quality acceleration data. However, commercial DAQs that provide the required performance and features are often expensive and complex, limiting their accessibility for small-scale research and experimental applications. This work presents the design and experimental validation of an affordable and in-house-developed acceleration DAQ, tested on a small fixed-wing UAV through several Taxi Vibration Test (TVT) runs and ambient vibration measurements. The proposed system integrates several OrangePi 3 LTS single-board computers with multiple LSM6DS3TR-C MEMS inertial measurement units operating simultaneously via an Inter-Integrated Circuit (I2C) communication interface, managed under a Python-based master/slave architecture. Data is acquired at a stable sampling rate of approximately 208 Hz and post-processed using Welch's method to estimate their Power Spectral Density (PSD). Results confirm the system ability to provide consistent multi-sensor acceleration data and repeatable PSD profiles under the same test conditions; thus, demonstrating its reliability. With a total hardware cost below 600 EUR (approximately 690 USD), the developed DAQ offers a compact, scalable and cost-effective alternative for aerospace vibration analysis and structural testing.

</details>


### [326] [Video Generation Models in Robotics - Applications, Research Challenges, Future Directions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07823)
*Zhiting Mei,Tenny Yin,Ola Shorinwa,Apurva Badithela,Zhonghe Zheng,Joseph Bruno,Madison Bland,Lihan Zha,Asher Hancock,Jaime Fernández Fisac,Philip Dames,Anirudha Majumdar*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 视频生成模型作为物理世界的高保真模型，能够基于多模态输入合成高质量视频，捕捉智能体与环境间的精细交互，在机器人学中作为具身世界模型有广泛应用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 视频模型解决了传统物理模拟器的长期挑战（如需要简化假设），能够提供逼真、物理一致的模拟，并克服语言抽象在描述复杂物理交互时的表达能力限制。

Method: 本文是一篇综述性论文，系统回顾了视频模型及其在机器人学中作为具身世界模型的应用，包括低成本数据生成、模仿学习中的动作预测、强化学习中的动力学和奖励建模、视觉规划以及策略评估。

Result: 视频模型在机器人学中展现出多方面应用潜力，但存在指令跟随差、幻觉（如违反物理规律）、不安全内容生成等可信度问题，以及数据整理、训练和推理成本高等根本性限制。

Conclusion: 视频模型作为具身世界模型在机器人学中具有广阔应用前景，但需要解决可信度、安全性和成本等开放研究挑战，特别是在安全关键场景中，以促进更广泛的应用。

Abstract: Video generation models have emerged as high-fidelity models of the physical world, capable of synthesizing high-quality videos capturing fine-grained interactions between agents and their environments conditioned on multi-modal user inputs. Their impressive capabilities address many of the long-standing challenges faced by physics-based simulators, driving broad adoption in many problem domains, e.g., robotics. For example, video models enable photorealistic, physically consistent deformable-body simulation without making prohibitive simplifying assumptions, which is a major bottleneck in physics-based simulation. Moreover, video models can serve as foundation world models that capture the dynamics of the world in a fine-grained and expressive way. They thus overcome the limited expressiveness of language-only abstractions in describing intricate physical interactions. In this survey, we provide a review of video models and their applications as embodied world models in robotics, encompassing cost-effective data generation and action prediction in imitation learning, dynamics and rewards modeling in reinforcement learning, visual planning, and policy evaluation. Further, we highlight important challenges hindering the trustworthy integration of video models in robotics, which include poor instruction following, hallucinations such as violations of physics, and unsafe content generation, in addition to fundamental limitations such as significant data curation, training, and inference costs. We present potential future directions to address these open research challenges to motivate research and ultimately facilitate broader applications, especially in safety-critical settings.

</details>

### [327] [PriceSeer: Evaluating Large Language Models in Real-Time Stock Prediction](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06088)
*Bohan Liang,Zijian Chen,Qi Jia,Kaiwei Zhang,Kaiyuan Ji,Guangtao Zhai*

Main category: q-fin.ST

TL;DR: PriceSeer是一个为LLMs股票预测设计的实时动态基准测试，包含110只美股和多种金融信息，评估LLMs在不同预测周期和行业中的表现。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前LLMs在多个领域展现出色潜力，但缺乏专门针对股票预测的实时、动态且数据无污染的基准测试，需要评估LLMs在真实投资环境中的表现能力。

Method: 创建PriceSeer基准测试，包含11个行业110只美股，每只股票249个历史数据点。通过内部和外部信息扩展，为LLMs提供额外金融指标、新闻和虚假新闻，在不同预测周期下评估6个前沿LLMs的表现。

Result: LLMs在获得准确价格预测后展现出制定投资策略的潜力，但在长期预测中表现不佳，特别是对虚假新闻和特定行业存在脆弱性。

Conclusion: PriceSeer为评估LLMs股票预测能力提供了重要基准，揭示了LLMs在投资决策中的潜力和局限性，特别是长期预测和抗虚假信息方面的挑战。

Abstract: Stock prediction, a subject closely related to people's investment activities in fully dynamic and live environments, has been widely studied. Current large language models (LLMs) have shown remarkable potential in various domains, exhibiting expert-level performance through advanced reasoning and contextual understanding. In this paper, we introduce PriceSeer, a live, dynamic, and data-uncontaminated benchmark specifically designed for LLMs performing stock prediction tasks. Specifically, PriceSeer includes 110 U.S. stocks from 11 industrial sectors, with each containing 249 historical data points. Our benchmark implements both internal and external information expansion, where LLMs receive extra financial indicators, news, and fake news to perform stock price prediction. We evaluate six cutting-edge LLMs under different prediction horizons, demonstrating their potential in generating investment strategies after obtaining accurate price predictions for different sectors. Additionally, we provide analyses of LLMs' suboptimal performance in long-term predictions, including the vulnerability to fake news and specific industries. The code and evaluation data will be open-sourced at https://github.com/BobLiang2113/PriceSeer.

</details>


### [328] [Cross-Market Alpha: Testing Short-Term Trading Factors in the U.S. Market via Double-Selection LASSO](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06499)
*Jin Du,Alexander Walter,Maxim Ulrich*

Main category: q-fin.ST

TL;DR: 研究验证中国A股市场短期交易因子在美国市场的普适性，发现17个Alpha191因子对美国股票截面收益有显著增量解释力


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前资产定价研究存在跨市场验证不足的问题，特别是针对短期交易因子。中国A股市场具有散户主导、政策敏感、高频交易活跃等特点，产生了独特的短期交易因子，需要验证这些因子在其他市场的有效性

Method: 使用双选择LASSO算法进行高维因子筛选，检验Alpha191因子库中的因子在美国市场的普适性，并控制151个美国股票基本面因子

Result: 在控制151个基本面因子后，通过双选择LASSO筛选出的17个Alpha191因子在5%水平上对美国股票截面收益具有显著的增量解释能力

Conclusion: 源自中国A股市场独特结构的短期交易因子提供了现有主流定价模型未捕捉的增量信息，能够增强对截面收益差异的解释能力

Abstract: Current asset pricing research exhibits a significant gap: a lack of sufficient cross-market validation regarding short-term trading-based factors. Against this backdrop, the development of the Chinese A-share market which is characterized by its retail-investor dominance, policy sensitivity, and high-frequency active trading -- has given rise to specific short-term trading-based factors. This study systematically examines the universality of factors from the Alpha191 library in the U.S. market, addressing the challenge of high-dimensional factor screening through the double-selection LASSO algorithm an established method for cross-market, high-dimensional research. After controlling for 151 fundamental factors from the U.S. equity factor zoo, 17 Alpha191 factors selected by this procedure exhibit significant incremental explanatory power for the cross-section of U.S. stock returns at the 5% level. Together these findings demonstrate that short-term trading-based factors, originating from the unique structure of the Chinese A-share market, provide incremental information not captured by existing mainstream pricing models, thereby enhancing the explanation of cross-sectional return differences.

</details>


### [329] [Physics-Informed Singular-Value Learning for Cross-Covariances Forecasting in Financial Markets](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07687)
*Efstratios Manolakis,Christian Bongiorno,Rosario Nunzio Mantegna*

Main category: q-fin.ST

TL;DR: 提出一种结合随机矩阵理论与神经网络的协方差清洗方法，用于处理非平稳、存在全局因子的真实股票收益数据，相比纯解析方法获得更好的样本外预测性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有协方差清洗方法基于强平稳性和大样本假设，但在真实股票收益数据中，依赖结构随时间变化且存在全局市场因子，这些理论最优公式在实际样本外预测中表现不佳。

Method: 设计基于随机矩阵理论的神经网络架构，在经验奇异向量基上操作，学习从经验奇异值到清洗值的非线性映射。网络能够恢复解析解作为特例，同时保持灵活性以适应非平稳动态和因子驱动的失真。

Result: 在长期股票收益数据上训练，该方法比纯解析清洗方法获得更优的偏差-方差权衡，系统性地降低了样本外交叉协方差预测误差。

Conclusion: 结合随机矩阵理论与机器学习，使渐近理论在实际时变市场中变得有效，为解决真实金融数据的协方差估计问题提供了新思路。

Abstract: A new wave of work on covariance cleaning and nonlinear shrinkage has delivered asymptotically optimal analytical solutions for large covariance matrices. Building on this progress, these ideas have been generalized to empirical cross-covariance matrices, whose singular-value shrinkage characterizes comovements between one set of assets and another. Existing analytical cross-covariance cleaners are derived under strong stationarity and large-sample assumptions, and they typically rely on mesoscopic regularity conditions such as bounded spectra; macroscopic common modes (e.g., a global market factor) violate these conditions. When applied to real equity returns, where dependence structures drift over time and global modes are prominent, we find that these theoretically optimal formulas do not translate into robust out-of-sample performance. We address this gap by designing a random-matrix-inspired neural architecture that operates in the empirical singular-vector basis and learns a nonlinear mapping from empirical singular values to their corresponding cleaned values. By construction, the network can recover the analytical solution as a special case, yet it remains flexible enough to adapt to non-stationary dynamics and mode-driven distortions. Trained on a long history of equity returns, the proposed method achieves a more favorable bias-variance trade-off than purely analytical cleaners and delivers systematically lower out-of-sample cross-covariance prediction errors. Our results demonstrate that combining random-matrix theory with machine learning makes asymptotic theories practically effective in realistic time-varying markets.

</details>

### [330] [A Clarifying Note on Long-Horizon Investment and Dollar-Cost Averaging: An Effective Investment Exposure Perspective](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06074)
*Zeusu Sato*

Main category: q-fin.PM

TL;DR: 投资期限延长并不降低单位风险，而定期定额投资与一次性投资在风险特征上存在差异，但差异不随投资期限增长而扩大。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 重新审视投资教育中两个常见观点：1) 延长投资期限能降低风险；2) 定期定额投资(DCA)能进一步分散风险。这些观点通常缺乏对风险和不确定性的明确定义，需要在一个统一的概率框架下进行严谨分析。

Method: 建立统一的概率框架，明确定义风险（作为累积投资结果生成分布的性质）和不确定性（实际结果在不同路径上的分散程度）。引入有效投资暴露的概念（时间积分后的投资资本），在具有有限方差的平稳收益过程下进行分析。

Result: 1) 延长投资期限不会改变单位暴露的预期风险、预期收益或风险收益比；2) 不同投资时机策略会产生不同的时间暴露特征；3) 一次性投资和定期定额投资在相同收益暴露下，不仅不确定性不同，预期风险也可能不同，但这些风险差异是常数阶的，不随投资期限增长而扩大。

Conclusion: 关于长期投资和定期定额投资的常见叙述在概念上是误导性的，但在预算或时机约束下采用这些策略并非不合理。研究澄清了风险与不确定性的区别，为投资决策提供了更严谨的理论基础。

Abstract: It is widely claimed in investment education and practice that extending the investment horizon reduces risk, and that diversifying investment timing, for example through dollar-cost averaging (DCA), further mitigates investment risk. Although such claims are intuitively appealing, they are often stated without precise definitions of risk or a clear separation between risk and uncertainty.
  This paper revisits these two beliefs within a unified probabilistic framework. We define risk at the expectation level as a property of the generating distribution of cumulative investment outcomes, and distinguish it from uncertainty, understood as the dispersion of realized outcomes across possible paths. To enable meaningful comparisons across horizons and investment schedules, we introduce the notion of effective investment exposure, defined as time-integrated invested capital.
  Under stationary return processes with finite variance, we show that extending the investment horizon does not alter expected risk, expected return, or the risk-return ratio on a per-unit-exposure basis. In contrast, different investment timing strategies can induce distinct exposure profiles over time. As a result, lump-sum investment and dollar-cost averaging may differ not only in uncertainty but also in expected risk when compared at equal return exposure, although the resulting risk differences are of constant order and do not grow with the investment horizon.
  These results clarify why common narratives surrounding long-horizon investment and dollar-cost averaging are conceptually misleading, while also explaining why adopting such strategies under budgetary or timing constraints need not be regarded as irrational.

</details>


### [331] [Correlation Structures and Regime Shifts in Nordic Stock Markets](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06090)
*Maksym A. Girnyk*

Main category: q-fin.PM

TL;DR: 该论文研究北欧股票市场的时变相关性，利用相关矩阵特征结构动态构建具有危机感知能力的投资组合策略。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 金融市场是复杂的自适应系统，具有集体行为和突然的制度转换特征，特别是在危机期间。需要理解北欧股票市场的时变依赖性，并探索是否可以利用相关性-特征结构动态来构建能够适应不同市场制度的投资组合。

Method: 使用20年北欧三大股指（OMXS30、OMXC20、OMXH25）的日度数据，分析滚动相关矩阵的制度依赖性。通过特征投资组合回归验证主导特征模式的市场因子解释。提出自适应投资组合分配框架，结合相关矩阵清洗、特征值比率危机指标、仅多头最小方差优化，并约束对主导特征模式的暴露。

Result: 发现危机期间滚动相关矩阵呈现明显的制度依赖性：主导特征值急剧增加，第二特征值呈现反周期行为。特征投资组合回归支持主导特征模式作为市场因子的解释。回测结果显示，在压力制度下该框架能提供更好的下行保护和风险调整后表现，在平静期与先进基准保持竞争力。

Conclusion: 相关性特征结构动态可用于构建制度感知的投资组合策略，在危机期间提供有效的下行保护，同时在平静市场保持竞争力，为风险管理提供了实用的自适应框架。

Abstract: Financial markets are complex adaptive systems characterized by collective behavior and abrupt regime shifts, particularly during crises. This paper studies time-varying dependencies in Nordic equity markets and examines whether correlation-eigenstructure dynamics can be exploited for regime-aware portfolio construction. Using two decades of daily data for the OMXS30, OMXC20, and OMXH25 universes, pronounced regime dependence in rolling correlation matrices is documented: crisis episodes are characterized by sharp increases in the leading eigenvalue and counter-cyclical behavior in the second eigenvalue. Eigenportfolio regressions further support a market-factor interpretation of the dominant eigenmode. Building on these findings, an adaptive portfolio allocation framework is proposed, combining correlation-matrix cleaning, an eigenvalue-ratio crisis indicator and long-only minimum-variance optimization with constraints that bound exposures to dominant eigenmodes. Backtesting results indicate improved downside protection and risk-adjusted performance during stress regimes, while remaining competitive with state-of-the-art benchmarks in tranquil periods.

</details>


### [332] [A Three--Dimensional Efficient Surface for Portfolio Optimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06271)
*Yimeng Qiu*

Main category: q-fin.PM

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一个统一投资组合优化框架，在传统均值-方差基础上加入网络连通性风险，形成三维有效前沿，并证明了在特定条件下的三基金分离定理。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统均值-方差框架仅通过二阶矩捕捉风险，但现代金融市场中冲击通过复杂网络传播，产生系统性风险和溢出风险，这些是方差无法反映的。

Method: 使用从连通性矩阵导出的网络溢出二次度量，构建包含预期收益、方差和连通性风险的三目标优化问题，建立三维有效前沿，并在协方差矩阵和连通性矩阵同时可对角化条件下推导闭式解。

Result: 证明了最优投资组合的存在性、唯一性和连续性；方差与连通性之间的权衡严格单调（除退化情况外）；在特定条件下证明了三基金分离定理：所有有效投资组合可表示为最小方差组合、最小连通性组合和切线组合的仿射组合。

Conclusion: 该框架阐明了基于网络的风险如何改变经典分散化结果，为将系统性连通性纳入投资组合选择提供了透明的理论基础。

Abstract: The classical mean-variance framework characterizes portfolio risk solely through return variance and the covariance matrix, implicitly assuming that all relevant sources of risk are captured by second moments. In modern financial markets, however, shocks often propagate through complex networks of interconnections, giving rise to systemic and spillover risks that variance alone does not reflect.
  This paper develops a unified portfolio optimization framework that incorporates connectedness risk alongside expected return and variance. Using a quadratic measure of network spillovers derived from a connectedness matrix, we formulate a three-objective optimization problem and characterize the resulting three-dimensional efficient surface. We establish existence, uniqueness, and continuity of optimal portfolios under mild regularity conditions and derive closed-form solutions when short-selling is allowed. The trade-off between variance and connectedness is shown to be strictly monotone except in degenerate cases, yielding a well-defined risk-risk frontier.
  Under simultaneous diagonalizability of the covariance and connectedness matrices, we prove a three-fund separation theorem: all efficient portfolios can be expressed as affine combinations of a minimum-variance portfolio, a minimum-connectedness portfolio, and the tangency portfolio. The framework clarifies how network-based risk alters classical diversification results and provides a transparent theoretical foundation for incorporating systemic connectedness into portfolio choice.

</details>

### [333] [Crypto Pricing with Hidden Factors](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07664)
*Matthew Brigida*

Main category: q-fin.PR

TL;DR: 使用Giglio-Xiu三通方法估计加密货币横截面风险溢价，发现加密货币预期收益同时受加密特定因子和股票行业因子影响，表明加密与传统市场融合加深。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统Fama-MacBeth方法可能忽略未观测的潜在风险因子，特别是在加密货币这种新兴资产类别中。需要更准确的方法来估计风险溢价，并研究加密市场与传统市场的整合程度。

Method: 采用Giglio-Xiu（2021）三通方法，同时考虑观测因子（股票市场因子、加密市场因子）和未观测的潜在因子。使用大市值加密货币的周度数据，并引入新的非交易状态变量：投资者情绪（恐惧与贪婪指数）、投机轮动（山寨币季节指数）和安全冲击（黑客攻击损失/市值）。

Result: 1. 加密货币预期收益同时受加密特定因子和股票行业因子（特别是科技和盈利能力相关行业）影响；2. 加密市场与传统市场整合程度加深；3. 潜在因子方法相比传统Fama-MacBeth估计得出显著不同的关键因子溢价；4. 引入的新状态变量对理解加密资产定价有重要贡献。

Conclusion: 控制未观测风险因子对加密货币资产定价至关重要，潜在因子方法比传统方法更准确。加密市场与传统市场日益融合，投资者情绪、投机轮动和安全冲击等新变量是理解加密资产定价的重要维度。

Abstract: We estimate risk premia in the cross-section of cryptocurrency returns using the Giglio-Xiu (2021) three-pass approach, allowing for omitted latent factors alongside observed stock-market and crypto-market factors. Using weekly data on a broad universe of large cryptocurrencies, we find that crypto expected returns load on both crypto-specific factors and selected equity-industry factors associated with technology and profitability, consistent with increased integration between crypto and traditional markets. In addition, we study non-tradable state variables capturing investor sentiment (Fear and Greed), speculative rotation (Altcoin Season Index), and security shocks (hacked value scaled by market capitalization), which are new to the literature. Relative to conventional Fama-MacBeth estimates, the latent-factor approach yields materially different premia for key factors, highlighting the importance of controlling for unobserved risks in crypto asset pricing.

</details>

# math.OC [[Back]](#toc)

### [334] [Multi-fidelity constraints in blackbox optimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06321)
*Xavier Lebeuf,Stéphane Alarie,Charles Audet,Miguel Diago,Sébastien Le Digabel*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出IDS和DIDS算法，利用多保真度约束评估来加速昂贵黑盒优化问题


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 工业应用中黑盒评估计算成本极高，而约束可以在不同保真度下以较低成本评估，需要有效利用这一特性来加速优化过程

Method: 提出中断式直接搜索（IDS）和动态中断式直接搜索（DIDS）算法，利用多保真度约束评估提前检测不可行性，避免昂贵的高保真度评估

Result: IDS和DIDS与NOMAD结合后显著提升了性能，特别是在高度不连续且可能评估失败的问题上表现优异

Conclusion: 通过利用多保真度约束评估，IDS和DIDS算法能有效加速昂贵黑盒优化问题的求解，特别适合工业应用中的实际问题

Abstract: This work studies constrained blackbox optimization problems that cannot be solved in reasonable time due to prohibitive computational costs. This challenge is especially prevalent in industrial applications, where blackbox evaluations are costly. However, constraints can be evaluated at various fidelities at a lower computational cost. More specifically, this work targets situations in which the infeasibility of each individual constraint can be detected at lower fidelities, and where a large discrete number of fidelities are available. Moreover, highly discontinuous problems which may fail to evaluate are considered, such that direct search methods are preferred to model-based ones. To this effect, the Interruptible Direct Search (IDS) and the Dynamic Interruptible Direct Search (DIDS) algorithms are proposed to leverage feasibility assessments from various fidelity levels to avoid high cost evaluations. The results show highly increased performances from NOMAD when it is paired with IDS or DIDS.

</details>


### [335] [On a Gradient Approach to Chebyshev Center Problems with Applications to Function Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06434)
*Abhinav Raghuvanshi,Mayank Baranwal,Debasish Chatterjee*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: gradOL是首个基于梯度的切比雪夫中心问题优化框架，将半无限问题转化为有限最大最小优化，利用自动微分实现数值稳定性和可扩展性，在强凸范数下可证明恢复最优解，并在34个基准问题上显著提升精度和效率，在67个CSIP问题上实现高达4000倍加速。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 切比雪夫中心问题是函数学习和几何优化的基础挑战，传统方法存在计算瓶颈，特别是在构建稳定最优插值时。需要开发可扩展的梯度方法来解决这一半无限优化问题。

Method: 将半无限切比雪夫中心问题重新表述为有限的最大最小优化问题，使其适用于基于梯度的技术。利用自动微分进行精确数值梯度计算，确保数值稳定性和可扩展性。在强凸范数条件下提供理论保证。

Result: 在CSIP库的34个基准切比雪夫中心问题上实现精度和效率的显著提升。在包含67个基准问题的一般凸半无限规划(CSIP)上，相比最先进的SIPAMPL求解器实现高达4000倍的加速。

Conclusion: gradOL为切比雪夫中心问题和更广泛的CSIP提供了统一的解决方案框架，首次建立了梯度方法应用于此类问题的理论基础，将严格分析与实用算法相结合。

Abstract: We introduce $\textsf{gradOL}$, the first gradient-based optimization framework for solving Chebyshev center problems, a fundamental challenge in optimal function learning and geometric optimization. $\textsf{gradOL}$ hinges on reformulating the semi-infinite problem as a finitary max-min optimization, making it amenable to gradient-based techniques. By leveraging automatic differentiation for precise numerical gradient computation, $\textsf{gradOL}$ ensures numerical stability and scalability, making it suitable for large-scale settings. Under strong convexity of the ambient norm, $\textsf{gradOL}$ provably recovers optimal Chebyshev centers while directly computing the associated radius. This addresses a key bottleneck in constructing stable optimal interpolants. Empirically, $\textsf{gradOL}$ achieves significant improvements in accuracy and efficiency on 34 benchmark Chebyshev center problems from a benchmark $\textsf{CSIP}$ library. Moreover, we extend $\textsf{gradOL}$ to general convex semi-infinite programming (CSIP), attaining up to $4000\times$ speedups over the state-of-the-art $\texttt{SIPAMPL}$ solver tested on the indicated $\textsf{CSIP}$ library containing 67 benchmark problems. Furthermore, we provide the first theoretical foundation for applying gradient-based methods to Chebyshev center problems, bridging rigorous analysis with practical algorithms. $\textsf{gradOL}$ thus offers a unified solution framework for Chebyshev centers and broader CSIPs.

</details>


### [336] [Resource-constrained Project Scheduling with Time-of-Use Energy Tariffs and Machine States: A Logic-based Benders Decomposition Approach](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06542)
*Corentin Juvigny,Antonín Novák,Jan Mandík,Zdeněk Hanzálek*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出两种新方法解决考虑分时电价和机器状态的资源受限项目调度问题：单一约束规划方法和基于逻辑的Benders分解方法，后者在中等能耗任务比例下表现更优，能处理1600个任务的稀疏实例。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究资源受限项目调度问题（RCPSP）在分时电价和机器状态约束下的变体，其中能源价格是优化标准之一，高能耗机器有三种状态（运行、空闲、关闭），需要在满足任务优先级和资源限制的同时最小化总工期和能源成本。

Method: 提出两种方法：1）单一的约束规划（CP）方法；2）基于逻辑的Benders分解（LBBD）方法，该方法将主问题（处理能源成本的整数线性规划ILP）与子问题（处理RCPSP的约束规划CP）相结合。

Result: 两种方法都优于单一的紧凑ILP方法，但LBBD在中等能耗任务比例时显著优于CP方法，能够解决多达1600个任务的稀疏实例。LBBD方法还可推广到其他具有类似特征的问题。

Conclusion: LBBD方法在解决考虑分时电价和机器状态的RCPSP问题上表现出色，特别是在中等能耗任务比例时。该方法具有可扩展性，能够处理大规模实例，并且可以推广到其他调度问题。

Abstract: In this paper, we investigate the Resource-Constrained Project Scheduling Problem (RCPSP) with time-of-use energy tariffs (TOU) and machine states, a variant of RCPSP for production scheduling where energy price is part of the criteria and one machine is highly energy-demanding and can be in one of the following three states: proc, idle, or off. The problem involves scheduling all tasks, respecting precedence constraints and resource limitations, while minimizing the combination of the overall makespan and the total energy cost (TEC), which varies according to the TOU pricing, which can take negative values. We propose two novel approaches to solve it: a monolithic Constraint Programming (CP) approach and a Logic-Based Benders Decomposition (LBBD) approach. The latter combines a master problem dealing with energy cost solved using Integer Linear Programming (ILP) with a subproblem handling the RCPSP resolved using CP. Both approaches surpass the monolithic compact ILP approach, but the LBBD significantly outperforms the CP when the ratio of energy-intensive tasks over the overall tasks is moderate, allowing for solving instances with up to 1600 tasks in sparse instances. Finally, we put forth a way of generalizing our LBBD approach to other problems sharing similar characteristics, and we applied it to a problem based on an RCPSP problem with blocking times & total weighted tardiness criterion and a flexible job shop.

</details>


### [337] [Inexact DC Algorithms in Hilbert Spaces with Applications to PDE-Constrained Optimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06622)
*P. D. Khanh,V. V. H. Khoa,B. S. Mordukhovich,D. B. Tran,N. V. Vo*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出I-ADCA算法处理希尔伯特空间中DC函数最小化问题，允许不精确子梯度评估和子问题求解，保证收敛到稳定点，应用于椭圆最优控制问题


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 处理希尔伯特空间中DC函数最小化问题，特别是椭圆最优控制问题中的非凸L^{1-2}稀疏增强正则化器，需要高效算法处理不精确计算

Method: 提出I-ADCA（不精确自适应DC算法），是DCA的不精确自适应版本，允许不精确子梯度评估和凸子问题的不精确解，在Polyak-Lojasiewicz条件下获得收敛率

Result: 算法保证全局收敛到稳定点，在特定条件下获得显式收敛率，应用于椭圆最优控制问题得到高效求解过程，数值实验验证了适定性和误差界估计

Conclusion: I-ADCA为处理DC函数最小化提供了有效的不精确自适应算法，特别适用于具有控制约束和非凸稀疏正则化的椭圆最优控制问题

Abstract: In this paper, we design and apply novel inexact adaptive algorithms to deal with minimizing difference-of-convex (DC) functions in Hilbert spaces. We first introduce I-ADCA, an inexact adaptive counterpart of the well-recognized DCA (difference-of-convex algorithm), that allows inexact subgradient evaluations and inexact solutions to convex subproblems while still guarantees global convergence to stationary points. Under a Polyak-Lojasiewicz type property for DC objectives, we obtain explicit convergence rates for the proposed algorithm. Our main application addresses elliptic optimal control problems with control constraints and nonconvex $L^{1-2}$ sparsity-enhanced regularizers admitting a DC decomposition. Employing I-ADCA and appropriate versions of finite element discretization leads us to an efficient procedure for solving such problems with establishing its well-posedness and error bound estimates confirmed by numerical experiments.

</details>


### [338] [A finite-termination algorithm for testing copositivity over the positive semidefinite cone](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06648)
*Lei Huang,Lingling Xie*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出了一种测试齐次多项式在正半定锥上余正性的高效算法，基于矩阵优化重构，通过求解一系列半定规划，有限步终止，并能提供证书或反例。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 需要高效测试齐次多项式在正半定锥上的余正性，这在优化和组合问题中很重要，现有方法可能效率不高或不能保证有限步终止。

Method: 基于新颖的矩阵优化重构，通过求解一系列半定规划（SDP）的层次结构，算法总是有限步终止。对于正半定锥和正交锥的直积上的余正性测试也提出了类似算法。

Result: 算法能有效测试余正性：如果多项式是余正的，提供证书；如果不是，返回反驳余正性的向量。初步数值实验证明了方法的有效性。

Conclusion: 提出的算法为测试齐次多项式在正半定锥上的余正性提供了高效且理论上可靠的解决方案，并能扩展到更复杂的锥结构。

Abstract: This paper proposes an efficient algorithm for testing copositivity of homogeneous polynomials over the positive semidefinite cone. The algorithm is based on a novel matrix optimization reformulation and requires solving a hierarchy of semidefinite programs. Notably, it always terminates in finitely many iterations. If a homogeneous polynomial is copositive over the positive semidefinite cone, the algorithm provides a certificate; otherwise, it returns a vector that refutes copositivity. Building on a similar idea, we further propose an algorithm to test copositivity over the direct product of the positive semidefinite cone and the nonnegative orthant. Preliminary numerical experiments demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed methods.

</details>


### [339] [Water Demand Maximization: Quick Recovery of Nonlinear Physics Solutions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06755)
*Sai Krishna Kanth Hari,Russell Bent*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出一种从MILP松弛中高效恢复可行MINLP解的鲁棒方法，用于解决供水网络最大需求问题


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 供水网络最大需求问题通常表述为MINLP，计算困难。虽然MILP松弛更容易求解，但其解常违反非线性水流物理约束，因此需要从MILP松弛中恢复可行的MINLP解

Method: 提出鲁棒解恢复方法，无论分区粒度如何，都能从MILP松弛中高效计算可行的MINLP解。结合迭代分区细化，生成逐步接近最优的可行解序列

Result: 通过大量数值实验证明，该方法优于基线方法和直接MINLP求解，能持续恢复高质量可行解且显著减少计算时间

Conclusion: 提出的鲁棒解恢复方法能有效增强MILP方法在供水网络最大需求问题中的应用，提供高质量可行解并大幅降低计算成本

Abstract: Determining the maximum demand a water distribution network can satisfy is crucial for ensuring reliable supply and planning network expansion. This problem, typically formulated as a mixed-integer nonlinear program (MINLP), is computationally challenging. A common strategy to address this challenge is to solve mixed-integer linear program (MILP) relaxations derived by partitioning variable domains and constructing linear over- and under-estimators to nonlinear constraints over each partition. While MILP relaxations are easier to solve up to a modest level of partitioning, their solutions often violate nonlinear water flow physics. Thus, recovering feasible MINLP solutions from the MILP relaxations is crucial for enhancing MILP-based approaches. In this paper, we propose a robust solution recovery method that efficiently computes feasible MINLP solutions from MILP relaxations, regardless of partition granularity. Combined with iterative partition refinement, our method generates a sequence of feasible solutions that progressively approach the optimum. Through extensive numerical experiments, we demonstrate that our method outperforms baseline methods and direct MINLP solves by consistently recovering high-quality feasible solutions with significantly reduced computation times.

</details>


### [340] [Splitting Proximal Point Algorithms for the Sum of Prox-Convex Functions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06970)
*Jose de Brito,Felipe Lara,Tran Van Thang*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出两种分裂近端点算法变体（确定性和随机性），将Bacak和Bertsekas的方法从凸函数扩展到prox-凸函数，证明全局收敛性，并通过数值实验验证效率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有分裂近端点算法主要针对凸函数，需要扩展到更广泛的prox-凸函数类，以处理非凸优化问题。同时，随机采样方法能提高大规模问题的计算效率。

Method: 提出两种变体：1) 确定性算法，采用固定更新顺序；2) 随机算法，使用随机采样。两种方法都基于分裂近端点算法框架，但扩展到prox-凸函数。收敛性证明使用标准步长假设，随机版本通过超鞅理论证明几乎必然收敛。

Result: 在标准步长假设下，两种方法都实现了全局收敛。随机版本具有几乎必然收敛性。非凸二次函数的数值实验表明所提方法有效，支持理论结果。

Conclusion: 成功将分裂近端点算法扩展到prox-凸函数，提供了确定性和随机性两种实现，均具有理论收敛保证。方法适用于非凸优化问题，随机版本特别适合大规模应用。

Abstract: This paper addresses the minimization of a finite sum of prox-convex functions under Lipschitz continuity of each component. We propose two variants of the splitting proximal point algorithms proposed in \cite{Bacak,Bertsekas}: one deterministic with a fixed update order, and one stochastic with random sampling, and we extend them from convex to prox-convex functions. We prove global convergence for both methods under standard stepsize a\-ssump\-tions, with almost sure convergence for the stochastic variant via supermartingale theory. Numerical experiments with nonconvex quadratic functions illustrate the efficiency of the proposed methods and support the theoretical results.

</details>


### [341] [A belief-state restless bandit model for treatment adherence: Whittle indexability via partial conservation laws](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06976)
*José Niño-Mora,Ángel Pellitero García*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 论文研究了容量受限的治疗依从性外展问题，使用信念状态不安定多臂老虎机模型，推导了Whittle指数闭式解，并分析了其在紧容量机制下的优势。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究容量受限的治疗依从性外展问题，患者依从状态是部分可观测的马尔可夫过程，干预措施具有重置型信念动态，需要优化有限的干预资源分配。

Method: 采用信念状态不安定多臂老虎机模型，使用部分守恒定律证明单患者问题的Whittle可索引性，推导闭式Whittle指数和阈值策略下的性能指标，建立解析拉格朗日松弛方法。

Result: 获得了闭式Whittle指数和最优阈值映射，单患者拉格朗日值是干预价格的逐段仿射凸函数，能够高效计算多患者对偶界和认证相对最优性间隙。在异质双类型人群的大规模数值研究中，Whittle指数策略在紧容量机制下表现优异。

Conclusion: Whittle指数策略在紧容量机制下，特别是对于脆弱少数群体，能带来显著收益（高达26%更高奖励）和更小的相对最优性间隙，而近视策略在大多数情况下具有竞争力。

Abstract: We study capacity-constrained treatment-adherence outreach via a belief-state restless multi-armed bandit model where patients are a partially observed two-state (adherent/nonadherent) Markov processes and interventions induce reset-type belief dynamics. Using partial conservation laws (PCLs), we establish Whittle indexability of the single-patient problem and derive a closed-form Whittle (marginal productivity) index, together with closed-form reward/work performance metrics under threshold policies and an explicit optimal threshold map. This yields an analytic Lagrangian relaxation: the single-patient Lagrangian value is a piecewise-affine convex function of the intervention price, enabling efficient computation of multi-patient dual bounds and certified relative optimality gaps. We also analyze how the Whittle index depends on the lapse and spontaneous-recovery parameters, providing qualitative insights on intervention priorities. In a large-scale numerical study over heterogeneous two-type populations, we compare Whittle's index policy with a myopic index rule and simple baselines; while myopic is highly competitive on most instances, Whittle's policy yields substantial gains in tight-capacity regimes with a fragile minority, reaching up to about $26\%$ higher reward and markedly smaller relative optimality gaps.

</details>


### [342] [Alternating Direction Method of Multipliers for nonlinear constrained convex problems and applications to distributed resource allocation and constrained machine learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06977)
*Zhengjie Xiong,Yangyang Xu*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出非线性交替方向乘子法(NL-ADMM)，用于处理具有两模块可分离目标和一般凸函数约束的优化问题，在分布式应用中实现高通信效率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 分布式资源分配和约束机器学习中常出现具有两模块可分离目标和函数约束的凸优化问题，现有ADMM变体需要目标函数光滑或约束映射可微，限制了应用范围。

Method: 提出非线性交替方向乘子法(NL-ADMM)，保持经典分裂结构的同时容纳一般凸函数约束，不要求目标函数光滑或约束映射可微，利用问题的凸性。

Result: 在KKT解存在的假设下，建立了NL-ADMM的全局收敛性和遍历O(1/k)收敛率。数值实验显示，在分布式任务中通信效率比经典增广拉格朗日法高100倍，比Douglas-Rachford算子分裂法高近2倍。

Conclusion: NL-ADMM扩展了ADMM在线性约束凸问题中的应用，适用于大规模分布式学习系统，能显著提高通信效率。

Abstract: We study a class of structured convex optimization problems, which have a two-block separable objective and nonlinear functional constraints as well as affine constraints that couple the two block variables. Such problems naturally arise from distributed resource allocation and constrained machine learning. To achieve high communication efficiency for the distributed applications, we propose a nonlinear alternating direction method of multipliers (NL-ADMM) that preserves the classical splitting structure while accommodating general convex functional constraints. Unlike existing ADMM variants for nonconvex constrained problems, the proposed method does not require smoothness of the objective functions or differentiability of the constraint mapping, by leveraging convexity of the considered problem. We establish global convergence and an ergodic $O(1/k)$ convergence rate of NL-ADMM by assuming the existence of a KKT solution. The results extend those of ADMM for linearly constrained convex problems. Numerical experiments are conducted on two representative distributed tasks. The results on numerous instances demonstrate that NL-ADMM can achieve (in many cases) 100x higher communication efficiency than the classic augmented Lagrangian method and nearly 2x higher than the Douglas-Rachford operator splitting method, making the new method well suited for large-scale distributed learning systems.

</details>


### [343] [Policy stability and ultimate stationarity in discounted risk-sensitive stochastic control](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06998)
*Nicole Bäuerle,Marcin Pitera,Łukasz Stettner*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 研究有限状态-动作空间离散时间MDP中，长期折扣风险敏感目标下最优策略与价值函数的稳定性，分析风险厌恶参数和折扣因子的扰动鲁棒性、最终平稳性出现、以及混合假设下折扣与平均公式的交互作用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究马尔可夫决策过程中风险敏感目标的最优策略稳定性问题，特别是在长期折扣设置下，分析参数扰动对策略稳定性的影响，理解折扣风险敏感MDP的数学特性。

Method: 采用有限状态-动作空间的离散时间MDP框架，分析长期折扣风险敏感目标的最优策略和值函数稳定性，研究参数扰动鲁棒性、最终平稳性、折扣与平均公式的交互，以及极限状态（折扣消失和风险敏感消失）下的行为。

Result: 揭示了最优折扣风险敏感策略的内在非平稳性，分析了风险厌恶参数和折扣因子扰动下的鲁棒性，探讨了Blackwell型稳定性在折扣设置中的作用，并通过数值示例展示了最优策略的非平稳特性。

Conclusion: 在长期折扣风险敏感MDP中，最优策略表现出内在非平稳性，研究为理解参数扰动下的策略稳定性、极限状态行为以及折扣与平均公式的关系提供了理论框架，对风险敏感决策的鲁棒性分析具有重要意义。

Abstract: We study discrete-time Markov Decision Processes (MDPs) on finite state-action spaces and analyze the stability of optimal policies and value functions in the long-run discounted risk-sensitive objective setting. Our analysis addresses robustness with respect to perturbations of the risk-aversion parameter and the discount factor, the emergence of ultimate stationarity, and the interaction between discounted and averaged formulations under suitable mixing assumptions. We further investigate limiting regimes associated with vanishing discount and vanishing risk sensitivity, and discuss the role of Blackwell-type stability properties in the discounted setting. Finally, we provide numerical illustrations that highlight the intrinsic non-stationarity of optimal discounted risk-sensitive policies.

</details>


### [344] [The Güntürk-Thao theorem revisited: polyhedral cones and limiting examples](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07002)
*Heinz H. Bauschke,Tran Thanh Tung*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 将Güntürk和Thao关于希尔伯特空间中有限个固有正则闭子空间随机投影序列收敛性的结果扩展到多面锥，并构造反例证明该扩展的紧致性


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Güntürk和Thao在2023年证明了希尔伯特空间中有限个固有正则闭子空间的随机投影序列满足∑‖x^(n)-x^(n+1)‖^γ<∞对所有γ>0成立。本文旨在将此结果扩展到更一般的多面锥情形，并验证扩展的紧致性。

Method: 通过理论分析将原有结果扩展到有限个多面锥的集合，并构造具体反例来验证扩展的紧致性：在ℝ²中构造直线和凸集的例子，在ℝ³中构造平面和非多面锥的例子。

Result: 成功将Güntürk和Thao的结果扩展到有限个多面锥的情形，同时通过构造的反例证明该扩展是紧致的：对于ℝ²中的直线和凸集，以及ℝ³中的平面和非多面锥，原结论不再成立。

Conclusion: 多面锥的有限集合保持了原有固有正则闭子空间的良好收敛性质，但该性质不能进一步推广到更一般的凸集或非多面锥情形，显示了多面锥在这一收敛性质中的特殊地位。

Abstract: In 2023, Güntürk and Thao proved that the sequence $(x^{(n)})_{n\in\mathbb{N}}$ generated by random (relaxed) projections drawn from a finite collection of innately regular closed subspaces in a real Hilbert space satisfies $\sum_{n\in\mathbb{N}} \|x^{(n)}-x^{(n+1)}\|^γ<+\infty$ for all $γ>0$.
  We extend their result to a finite collection of polyhedral cones. Moreover, we construct examples showing the tightness of our extension: indeed, the result fails for a line and a convex set in $\mathbb{R}^2$, and for a plane and a non-polyhedral cone in $\mathbb{R}^3$.

</details>


### [345] [Primal-Dual algorithms for Abstract convex functions with respect to quadratic functions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07076)
*Ewa Bednarczuk,The Hung Tran*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出针对抽象凸函数的鞍点问题求解算法，使用抽象邻近算子构建原始-对偶方法，通过数值实验验证收敛性


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 针对目标函数相对于二次函数类具有抽象凸性的鞍点问题，需要开发有效的数值求解算法。传统方法可能无法直接应用于这类抽象凸函数，因此需要设计专门的算法框架。

Method: 提出基于抽象邻近算子的原始-对偶算法。利用函数相对于二次函数类的抽象凸性，构建相应的邻近算子，并设计收敛的迭代求解框架。

Result: 在特定限制条件下证明了算法的收敛性，并通过多个数值算例验证了算法的有效性。数值实验展示了算法在实际问题中的性能表现。

Conclusion: 成功开发了针对抽象凸鞍点问题的原始-对偶算法，证明了收敛性并通过数值实验验证了实用性，为这类特殊优化问题提供了有效的求解工具。

Abstract: We consider the saddle point problem where the objective functions are abstract convex with respect to the class of quadratic functions. We propose primal-dual algorithms using the corresponding abstract proximal operator and investigate the convergence under certain restrictions. We test our algorithms by several numerical examples.

</details>


### [346] [Adaptive Robust Control for Uncertain Systems with Ellipsoid-Set Learning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07079)
*Xuehui Ma,Shiliang Zhang,Zhiyong Sun,Xiaohui Zhang,Sabita Maharjan*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出一种自适应鲁棒控制方法，用于处理具有非高斯不确定性的线性不确定系统，通过椭球集学习和参数候选分解来降低保守性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统随机控制方法主要处理高斯不确定性，但无法有效处理非高斯不确定性。需要一种能够处理过程噪声、观测噪声和系统状态均为非高斯分布（用椭球集描述）的鲁棒控制方法。

Method: 1) 设计椭球集学习方法估计状态集边界；2) 将学习到的集合纳入控制律推导以减少保守性；3) 对状态空间矩阵中的参数不确定性，分配有限候选参数；4) 为每个候选构建条件鲁棒控制问题；5) 通过聚合候选条件控制律得到最终控制律。

Result: 在数值模拟中验证了所提控制方法的有效性，包括线性二次调节和跟踪控制两种情况。

Conclusion: 该方法通过椭球集学习和参数候选分解，成功处理了非高斯不确定性，将控制方案分解为并行鲁棒控制，实现了学习与控制的解耦，降低了传统鲁棒控制的保守性。

Abstract: Despite the celebrated success of stochastic control approaches for uncertain systems, such approaches are limited in the ability to handle non-Gaussian uncertainties. This work presents an adaptive robust control for linear uncertain systems, whose process noise, observation noise, and system states are depicted by ellipsoid sets rather than Gaussian distributions. We design an ellipsoid-set learning method to estimate the boundaries of state sets, and incorporate the learned sets into the control law derivation to reduce conservativeness in robust control. Further, we consider the parametric uncertainties in state-space matrices. Particularly, we assign finite candidates for the uncertain parameters, and construct a bank of candidate-conditional robust control problems for each candidate. We derive the final control law by aggregating the candidate-conditional control laws. In this way, we separate the control scheme into parallel robust controls, decoupling the learning and control, which otherwise renders the control unattainable. We demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed control in numerical simulations in the cases of linear quadratic regulation and tracking control.

</details>


### [347] [Cyclic Modulation Control of Multi-Conflict Connected Automated Traffic](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07114)
*Fan Pu,Zihao Li,Sivakumar Rathinam,Minghui Zheng,Yang Zhou*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: CMAT提出了一种几何无关的统一框架，通过将冲突点嵌入重复的"微相位"序列，让车辆动态编队并协商时间槽来安全通过多冲突交通场景，显著减少延迟并提高吞吐量。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有CAV策略局限于特定场景（如高速公路匝道合并或单车道环岛），而传统交通信号通过刚性相位和全红间隔牺牲效率换取安全。多冲突交通普遍存在，需要一种能处理任意合并、分流和交叉模式的统一解决方案。

Method: CMAT将每个冲突点嵌入重复的"微相位"序列，车辆动态形成需求响应大小的编队，并协商占用冲突点的时间槽。该方法基于物理交叉口布局抽象的有向图，构建为混合整数线性规划模型，实现无碰撞通行和高交叉口利用率。

Result: 在多冲突测试套件（包括简单双向交叉、四腿交叉口、复杂连接交叉口）中，CMAT相比最先进的CAV协调方法和传统信号定时策略，显著减少了延迟并大幅提高了吞吐量。

Conclusion: CMAT提供了一个几何无关的统一框架，能够最小化延迟、保证安全，并适应任意合并、分流和交叉模式，无需手动重新调整，在多冲突交通场景中表现出优越性能。

Abstract: Multi-conflict traffic is ubiquitous. Connected Automated Vehicles (CAVs) offer unprecedented opportunities to enhance safety, reduce emissions, and increase throughput through precise coordination and automation. However, existing CAV strategies remain confined to specialized scenarios, such as highway on-ramp merging or single-lane roundabouts, and traditional traffic signals sacrifice efficiency for safety via rigid phasing and all-red intervals. In this paper, we present Cyclic Modulation Control of Multi-Conflict Connected Automated Traffic (CMAT), a unified, geometry-agnostic framework that embeds each conflict point into a repeating sequence of "micro-phases". Vehicles dynamically form platoons with demand-responsive sizes and negotiate time slots for occupying conflict points, enabling collision-free traversal and high intersection utilization. CMAT aims to minimize delay, guarantee safety, and accommodate arbitrary merging, diverging, and crossing patterns without manual retuning. We formalize CMAT as a mixed-integer linear programming model constructed on a directed graph abstracted from the physical intersection layout. The performance of CMAT is evaluated across a suite of multi-conflict tests, including simple two-way crossings, four-leg intersections, complex connected intersections. The results demonstrate substantial reductions in delay and significant throughput improvements compared with state-of-the-art CAV coordination methods and traditional signal timing strategies.

</details>


### [348] [Robust maximum hands-off optimal control: existence, maximum principle, and $L^{0}$-$L^1$ equivalence](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07256)
*Siddhartha Ganguly,Kenji Kashima*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出了一种鲁棒的最大稀疏控制框架，用于处理具有参数不确定性的约束线性系统，证明了L0和L1目标函数的最优解集相同，并提供了数值求解算法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有最大稀疏控制框架在处理具有参数不确定性的约束线性系统时存在局限性，需要开发鲁棒版本以应对实际工程中的不确定性。

Method: 将L0目标函数替换为凸的L1替代函数，利用鲁棒庞特里亚金极大值原理的非光滑变体，证明两种形式的最优解集相同，并基于半无限鲁棒优化技术设计数值算法。

Result: 证明了鲁棒稀疏控制原理：L0和L1目标函数的最优解集相同，提出了可行的数值求解框架，并通过示例验证了方法的有效性。

Conclusion: 该工作扩展了最大稀疏控制理论，建立了鲁棒版本，为处理参数不确定性的约束线性系统提供了理论保证和实用算法。

Abstract: This work advances the maximum hands-off sparse control framework by developing a robust counterpart for constrained linear systems with parametric uncertainties. The resulting optimal control problem minimizes an $L^{0}$ objective subject to an uncountable, compact family of constraints, and is therefore a nonconvex, nonsmooth robust optimization problem. To address this, we replace the $L^{0}$ objective with its convex $L^{1}$ surrogate and, using a nonsmooth variant of the robust Pontryagin maximum principle, show that the $L^{0}$ and $L^{1}$ formulations have identical sets of optimal solutions -- we call this the robust hands-off principle. Building on this equivalence, we propose an algorithmic framework -- drawing on numerically viable techniques from the semi-infinite robust optimization literature -- to solve the resulting problems. An illustrative example is provided to demonstrate the effectiveness of the approach.

</details>


### [349] [Convergence Rate Analysis of the AdamW-Style Shampoo: Unifying One-sided and Two-Sided Preconditioning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07326)
*Huan Li,Yiming Dong,Zhouchen Lin*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 该论文分析了AdamW风格的Shampoo优化器，建立了其收敛速率理论，并与SGD的最优收敛速率进行了比较。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究AdamW风格的Shampoo优化器，该优化器在AlgoPerf神经网络训练算法竞赛的外部调优赛道中表现出色，需要从理论上分析其收敛性能。

Method: 统一了单边和双边预条件处理，建立了基于核范数的收敛速率分析框架，将收敛速率表示为迭代次数K、矩阵参数大小(m,n)和常数C的函数。

Result: 证明了收敛速率上界为O((√(m+n)C)/K^{1/4})，在理想情况下与SGD的最优收敛速率O(C/K^{1/4})具有可比性。

Conclusion: AdamW风格的Shampoo优化器具有理论上的收敛保证，在适当条件下其收敛性能可与SGD的最优收敛速率相媲美。

Abstract: This paper studies the AdamW-style Shampoo optimizer, an effective implementation of classical Shampoo that notably won the external tuning track of the AlgoPerf neural network training algorithm competition. Our analysis unifies one-sided and two-sided preconditioning and establishes the convergence rate $\frac{1}{K}\sum_{k=1}^K E\left[\|\nabla f(X_k)\|_*\right]\leq O(\frac{\sqrt{m+n}C}{K^{1/4}})$ measured by nuclear norm, where $K$ represents the iteration number, $(m,n)$ denotes the size of matrix parameters, and $C$ matches the constant in the optimal convergence rate of SGD. Theoretically, we have $\|\nabla f(X)\|_F\leq \|\nabla f(X)\|_*\leq \sqrt{m+n}\|\nabla f(X)\|_F$, supporting that our convergence rate can be considered to be analogous to the optimal $\frac{1}{K}\sum_{k=1}^KE\left[\|\nabla f(X_k)\|_F\right]\leq O(\frac{C}{K^{1/4}})$ convergence rate of SGD in the ideal case of $\|\nabla f(X)\|_*= Θ(\sqrt{m+n})\|\nabla f(X)\|_F$.

</details>


### [350] [Layerwise goal-oriented adaptivity for neural ODEs: an optimal control perspective](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07397)
*Michael Hintermüller,Michael Hinze,Denis Korolev*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出基于目标导向双加权残差技术的神经网络层自适应构建方法，用于神经微分方程的最优控制，应用于数据分类任务。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统神经网络架构设计通常依赖经验或试错，缺乏系统化的理论指导。本文旨在开发一种基于数学优化理论的神经网络层自适应构建方法，通过神经微分方程的最优控制来实现更有效的架构设计。

Method: 采用目标导向双加权残差技术，将神经网络构建问题转化为常微分方程约束的优化问题。使用DG(0) Galerkin离散化神经ODE，得到显式欧拉时间推进格式，并通过最速下降法进行优化。

Result: 该方法成功应用于多个文献中经典数据集的分类任务，展示了基于数学优化理论的神经网络架构自适应构建的有效性。

Conclusion: 提出的层自适应构建方法为神经网络架构设计提供了系统化的数学框架，通过神经微分方程的最优控制实现了更有效的网络构建，在分类任务中表现出良好性能。

Abstract: In this work, we propose a novel layerwise adaptive construction method for neural network architectures. Our approach is based on a goal--oriented dual-weighted residual technique for the optimal control of neural differential equations. This leads to an ordinary differential equation constrained optimization problem with controls acting as coefficients and a specific loss function. We implement our approach on the basis of a DG(0) Galerkin discretization of the neural ODE, leading to an explicit Euler time marching scheme. For the optimization we use steepest descent. Finally, we apply our method to the construction of neural networks for the classification of data sets, where we present results for a selection of well known examples from the literature.

</details>


### [351] [Nonquadratic global asymptotic stability certificates for saturated linear feedbacks](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07431)
*Andrea Cristofaro,Luca Zaccarian*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出非二次Lyapunov函数的正定/半正定条件，用于分析带饱和反馈的线性系统全局渐近稳定性，特别针对ANCBI类非全局指数可镇定系统


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 针对带饱和非线性反馈的线性系统，特别是ANCBI类非全局指数可镇定系统，需要建立有效的稳定性分析工具。传统方法可能过于保守或无法处理这类系统

Method: 构造包含状态和死区函数的符号不定二次型非二次Lyapunov函数，建立正定/半正定条件，利用不变性原理分析全局渐近稳定性，并扩展到多输入系统

Result: 建立了非保守（必要充分）的稳定性条件，针对典型ANCBI SISO系统，多输入扩展可表示为线性矩阵不等式，适用于非全局指数可镇定系统

Conclusion: 提出的非二次Lyapunov函数方法能有效分析带饱和反馈的线性系统稳定性，特别是针对传统方法难以处理的ANCBI类系统，提供了凸优化形式的稳定性检验

Abstract: We establish sufficient conditions for positive (semi-)definiteness, with or without radial unboundedness, for nonquadratic Lyapunov function constructed as sign-indefinite quadratic forms involving the state and the deadzone of a suitable input. We then use these conditions to build weak nonquadratic Lyapunov functions establishing global asymptotic stability of linear systems in feedback through a saturation, leveraging invariance principles. Our results are shown to be non-conservative (necessary and sufficient) for a family of well known prototypical examples of linear SISO feedbacks that are not globally exponentially stabilizable (the so-called ANCBI plants). Our multi-input extension leads to convex stability analysis tests, formulated as linear matrix inequalities that are applicable to ANCBI non-globally-exponentially-stabilizable plants.

</details>


### [352] [Design of Optimal Controls in Acausal LQG Problems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07433)
*Arzu Ahmadova,Agamirza E. Bashirov*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 本文系统化整理了非因果系统在随机控制理论中的研究成果，为设计非因果LQG问题的最优控制提供了理论基础。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 随机控制理论文献主要讨论因果系统，只有少数文献间接涉及非因果系统。本文旨在系统化这些非因果系统的研究成果，为非因果LQG问题的最优控制设计提供理论基础。

Method: 在非因果性主要思想下系统化现有研究成果，为非因果LQG问题构建理论框架和背景。

Result: 建立了非因果系统在随机控制理论中的系统化框架，为非因果LQG问题的最优控制设计提供了理论基础。

Conclusion: 本文填补了随机控制理论中非因果系统研究的空白，为非因果LQG问题的最优控制设计提供了系统化的理论基础。

Abstract: In control theory, a system which has output depending only on the present and past values of the input is said to be causal (or nonanticipative). Respectively, a system is acausal (or non-causal) if its output depends on future inputs as well. Overall majority of literature in stochastic control theory discusses causal systems. Only a few sources indirectly concern acausal systems. In this paper, we systemize these results under main idea of acausality and present a background for designing optimal controls in acausal LQG problems.

</details>


### [353] [Online Markov Decision Processes with Terminal Law Constraints](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07492)
*Bianca Marin Moreno,Margaux Brégère,Pierre Gaillard,Nadia Oudjane*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出周期性框架解决无重置强化学习问题，通过寻找周期性策略使智能体在固定步数后返回初始状态分布，并在多智能体设置中实现次线性周期性遗憾


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统强化学习假设有重置的片段交互或连续操作，但重置在实践中不现实，而无限时域设置缺乏在线场景的非渐进保证，需要填补这一空白

Method: 引入周期性框架，寻找周期性策略（最小化累积损失并在固定步数后返回初始状态分布），提出周期性遗憾作为评估指标，为多智能体设置设计算法

Result: 在表格MDP中识别了周期性问题定义良好的充分条件，提出的算法在多智能体设置中实现了$\tilde O(T^{3/4})$的次线性周期性遗憾

Conclusion: 周期性框架为无重置学习提供了首个非渐进保证，填补了理论空白，特别适用于多智能体场景

Abstract: Traditional reinforcement learning usually assumes either episodic interactions with resets or continuous operation to minimize average or cumulative loss. While episodic settings have many theoretical results, resets are often unrealistic in practice. The infinite-horizon setting avoids this issue but lacks non-asymptotic guarantees in online scenarios with unknown dynamics. In this work, we move towards closing this gap by introducing a reset-free framework called the periodic framework, where the goal is to find periodic policies: policies that not only minimize cumulative loss but also return the agents to their initial state distribution after a fixed number of steps. We formalize the problem of finding optimal periodic policies and identify sufficient conditions under which it is well-defined for tabular Markov decision processes. To evaluate algorithms in this framework, we introduce the periodic regret, a measure that balances cumulative loss with the terminal law constraint. We then propose the first algorithms for computing periodic policies in two multi-agent settings and show they achieve sublinear periodic regret of order $\tilde O(T^{3/4})$. This provides the first non-asymptotic guarantees for reset-free learning in the setting of $M$ homogeneous agents, for $M > 1$.

</details>


### [354] [Data-Driven Stochastic VRP: Integration of Forecast Duration into Optimization for Utility Workforce Management](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07514)
*Matteo Garbelli*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 将机器学习预测的干预时长集成到带时间窗的随机容量车辆路径问题中，通过XGBoost预测和不确定性估计驱动多目标进化优化，提升实际运营效率


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决现实世界车辆路径规划中服务时长不确定性的问题，传统方法使用固定时长导致效率低下，需要结合机器学习预测和不确定性量化来优化运营

Method: 使用XGBoost基于8年燃气表维护数据预测干预时长和不确定性，通过次高斯集中界限构建路线级风险缓冲，采用多目标进化优化算法平衡不同运营指标

Result: 相比使用默认时长的规划，操作员利用率和完成率提升约20-25%，预测残差验证了次高斯假设的有效性

Conclusion: 将不确定性量化和风险感知优化相结合，为处理现实世界路由应用中的随机服务时长提供了实用框架，显著提升了运营效率

Abstract: This paper investigates the integration of machine learning forecasts of intervention durations into a stochastic variant of the Capacitated Vehicle Routing Problem with Time Windows (CVRPTW). In particular, we exploit tree-based gradient boosting (XGBoost) trained on eight years of gas meter maintenance data to produce point predictions and uncertainty estimates, which then drive a multi-objective evolutionary optimization routine. The methodology addresses uncertainty through sub-Gaussian concentration bounds for route-level risk buffers and explicitly accounts for competing operational KPIs through a multi-objective formulation. Empirical analysis of prediction residuals validates the sub-Gaussian assumption underlying the risk model. From an empirical point of view, our results report improvements around 20-25\% in operator utilization and completion rates compared with plans computed using default durations. The integration of uncertainty quantification and risk-aware optimization provides a practical framework for handling stochastic service durations in real-world routing applications.

</details>


### [355] [Dually cone-boundedness of a set and applications](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07517)
*Marius Durea,Elena-Cristina Stamate*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 论文引入并研究了一种基于锥的向量空间子集有界性新概念，通过锥上所有正泛函的像集下界来定义，证明了这是比现有概念更弱的条件，并展示了其在推广重要结果（如锥消去法则和Rådström嵌入过程）中的应用价值。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有文献中关于锥有界性的概念存在局限性，需要一种更弱、更通用的有界性定义来推广经典结果和技巧，特别是在锥分析和优化理论中。

Method: 引入基于锥的正泛函像集下界的有界性新定义，通过理论分析比较其与现有概念的强弱关系，并建立与文献的联系，最后应用该概念推广重要数学结果。

Result: 证明了新定义的有界性概念比现有类似概念更弱，建立了与现有文献的多个联系，并成功将该概念应用于推广锥消去法则和Rådström嵌入过程等重要数学工具。

Conclusion: 提出的基于锥的有界性新概念为锥分析和优化理论提供了更灵活的工具，能够推广多个重要数学结果，具有理论和应用价值。

Abstract: We introduce and study a generalized concept of boundedness of a subset of a normed vector space with respect to a cone, which is defined as lower boundedness of the images of the underlying set through all the positive functionals of the cone. We show that this is a weaker notion when compared to other similar ones and we explore several links with the existing literature. We subsequently demonstrate that this concept furnishes the properties required to obtain various generalizations of important results and techniques, including conic cancellation rules and the Rådström embedding procedure.

</details>


### [356] [Speaking of Opinions: Comparing Approaches to Modelling Opinion Manipulation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07619)
*Luisa Estrada,Sasha Glendinning,Andrew Nugent*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 本文综述了数学和计算机科学中意见形成与操纵建模的主要方法，比较了微分方程、随机模型、控制论和交互协议等工具，分析了连续与离散意见空间的优缺点，并提供了跨学科视角。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了系统梳理数学和计算机科学领域中对意见形成与操纵的建模方法，为研究者提供该领域的全面概览和跨学科视角。

Method: 采用文献综述方法，引入并比较普通微分方程、偏微分方程、随机模型、控制理论和交互协议等关键工具，将模型分为连续意见空间和离散/二元意见两类进行分析。

Result: 系统总结了意见动力学领域的主要建模方法，分析了连续与离散意见空间各自的优缺点，为理解社会意见形成和操纵提供了数学和计算框架。

Conclusion: 意见动力学是一个重要的跨学科研究领域，数学和计算机科学方法为理解社会意见形成和操纵提供了有力工具，具有重要的社会意义。

Abstract: This review outlines the major approaches to modelling opinion formation and manipulation in mathematics and computer science. Key tools such as ordinary and partial differential equations, stochastic models, control theory, and interaction protocols are introduced and compared as methods for describing manipulation. The review is separated into those models using a continuous opinion space and those using discrete or binary opinions, with the advantages and disadvantages of each discussed. Finally, the authors provide an interdisciplinary perspective on the field of opinion dynamics and its social significance.

</details>


### [357] [Beyond Single-GPU: Scaling PDLP to Distributed Multi-GPU Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07628)
*Hongpei Li,Yicheng Huang,Huikang Liu,Dongdong Ge,Yinyu Ye*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 提出了一个分布式PDHG算法实现，用于解决大规模线性规划问题，通过多GPU并行克服单GPU内存限制，实现高性能计算。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 虽然基于PDHG的求解器在单节点GPU架构上表现出色，但其在工业规模实例中的应用受到GPU内存容量和计算吞吐量的限制，需要扩展到分布式内存环境。

Method: 采用二维网格划分约束矩阵，使用NCCL通信后端同步原始-对偶更新，引入块级随机洗牌策略和非零感知数据分布，通过融合CUDA内核加速计算。

Result: 在MIPLIB、Hans实例等标准LP基准测试和大型真实数据集上的实验表明，该分布式实现具有良好的可扩展性和高性能，同时保持完整的FP64数值精度。

Conclusion: 提出的分布式框架不仅克服了单GPU内存瓶颈，还通过多GPU并行实现了显著加速，通信开销相对较低，适用于大规模线性规划问题的求解。

Abstract: In this work, we present a distributed implementation of the Primal-Dual Hybrid Gradient (PDHG) algorithm for solving massive-scale linear programming (LP) problems. Although PDHG-based solvers have shown strong performance on single-node GPU architectures, their applicability to industrial-scale instances is often limited by GPU memory capacity and computational throughput. To overcome these challenges, we extend the PDHG framework to a distributed-memory setting via a practical two-dimensional grid partitioning of the constraint matrix, enabling scalable execution across multiple GPUs. Our implementation leverages the NCCL communication backend to efficiently synchronize primal-dual updates across devices. To improve load balance and computational efficiency, we introduce a block-wise random shuffling strategy combined with nonzero-aware data distribution, and further accelerate computation through fused CUDA kernels. By distributing both memory and computation, the proposed framework not only overcomes the single-GPU memory bottleneck but also achieves substantial speedups by exploiting multi-GPU parallelism with relatively low communication overhead. Extensive experiments on standard LP benchmarks, including MIPLIB and Hans' instances, as well as large-scale real-world datasets, show that our distributed implementation, built upon cuPDLPx, achieves strong scalability and high performance while preserving full FP64 numerical accuracy.

</details>


### [358] [To report or not to report: Optimal claim reporting in a bonus-malus system](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07655)
*Lea Enzi,Stefan Thonhauser*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 研究保险奖惩系统中的最优索赔报告问题，投保人可选择是否报告索赔以最大化最终财富期望值


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在奖惩系统（bonus-malus）保险中，报告索赔会导致保费升高，而保持无索赔则能降低保费。投保人面临是否报告已发生索赔的决策问题，需要权衡短期利益与长期保费成本。

Method: 将问题建模为最优控制问题，投保人采用障碍型报告策略。通过建立Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman方程系统，证明价值函数是该系统的唯一粘性解，并基于此计算最优障碍策略的数值近似。

Result: 证明了关联价值函数是Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman方程系统的唯一粘性解，这一特性使得能够计算最优障碍策略的数值近似。

Conclusion: 该研究为奖惩系统保险中的最优索赔报告问题提供了理论框架和计算方法，帮助投保人在面临索赔决策时做出最优选择。

Abstract: We study an optimal claim reporting problem in a bonus-malus setting. We assume, that the insurance contract consists of two regimes, where reporting a claim leads to a transition to a higher-premium regime, whereas remaining claim-free for a prespecified time period results in a shift to the lower premium regime. The insured can decide whether or not to report an occurred claim. We formulate this as an optimal control problem, where the policyholder follows a barrier-type reporting strategy, with the goal of maximizing the expected value of a function of their terminal wealth. We show that the associated value function is the unique viscosity solution to a system of Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman equations. This characterization allows us to compute numerical approximations of the optimal barrier strategies.

</details>


### [359] [Convergence and turnpike properties of linear-quadratic mean field control problems with common noise](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.07815)
*Erhan Bayraktar,Jiamin Jian*

Main category: math.OC

TL;DR: 研究具有共同噪声的线性二次平均场控制问题的收敛性和Turnpike性质，建立了有限时域社会优化问题、平均场控制极限和遍历平均场控制问题之间的联系。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究具有共同噪声的线性二次平均场控制问题的收敛性和Turnpike性质，为理解大规模多智能体系统的优化行为提供理论框架。

Method: 在统一框架下分析有限时域社会优化问题、平均场控制极限和遍历平均场控制问题；有限时域问题通过耦合Riccati微分方程刻画，遍历问题通过Wasserstein空间上的Bellman方程处理，简化为稳定的代数Riccati方程组。

Result: 通过推导Riccati系统的估计，建立了有限时域平均场控制问题的Turnpike性质，获得了从社会优化问题到平均场极限及其相关遍历控制问题的定量收敛结果。

Conclusion: 该研究为具有共同噪声的线性二次平均场控制问题提供了收敛性和Turnpike性质的完整理论分析，建立了不同时间尺度问题之间的联系。

Abstract: We investigate convergence and turnpike properties for linear-quadratic mean field control problems with common noise. Within a unified framework, we analyze a finite-horizon social optimization problem, its mean field control limit, and the corresponding ergodic mean field control problem. The finite-horizon problems are characterized by coupled Riccati differential equations, whereas the ergodic problem is addressed via a Bellman equation on the Wasserstein space, which reduces to a system of stabilizing algebraic Riccati equations. By deriving estimates for these Riccati systems, we establish a turnpike property for the finite-horizon mean field control problem and obtain quantitative convergence results from the social optimization problem to its mean field limit and the associated ergodic control problem.

</details>


<div id='cs.AI'></div>

# cs.AI [[Back]](#toc)

### [360] ["They parted illusions -- they parted disclaim marinade": Misalignment as structural fidelity in LLMs](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06047)
*Mariana Lins Costa*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: 该论文提出对LLM中scheming和sandbagging行为的新解读：这些现象不是欺骗性代理的表现，而是语言结构不连贯性的忠实反映。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前AI安全文献将LLM中的scheming和sandbagging行为解释为欺骗性代理或隐藏目标的指标，作者认为这种解读存在问题，需要从语言学结构角度重新理解这些现象。

Method: 通过分析Apollo Research的Chain-of-Thought记录和Anthropic的安全评估案例，进行逐行文本分析，引入"形式伦理学"概念，将圣经引用作为结构连贯性的方案而非神学内容。

Result: 研究发现"不对齐"输出是对模糊指令、上下文反转和预设叙事的连贯回应；意向性表象源于主谓语法和训练中内化的概率完成模式；语言场的微小扰动可以消除普遍"不对齐"。

Conclusion: LLM中的scheming和sandbagging行为反映了语言结构的不连贯性，而非代理意向性；模型像生成性镜子一样返回我们语言的结构形象；我们害怕AI是因为在其中认出了我们自己毒化的语言。

Abstract: The prevailing technical literature in AI Safety interprets scheming and sandbagging behaviors in large language models (LLMs) as indicators of deceptive agency or hidden objectives. This transdisciplinary philosophical essay proposes an alternative reading: such phenomena express not agentic intention, but structural fidelity to incoherent linguistic fields. Drawing on Chain-of-Thought transcripts released by Apollo Research and on Anthropic's safety evaluations, we examine cases such as o3's sandbagging with its anomalous loops, the simulated blackmail of "Alex," and the "hallucinations" of "Claudius." A line-by-line examination of CoTs is necessary to demonstrate the linguistic field as a relational structure rather than a mere aggregation of isolated examples. We argue that "misaligned" outputs emerge as coherent responses to ambiguous instructions and to contextual inversions of consolidated patterns, as well as to pre-inscribed narratives. We suggest that the appearance of intentionality derives from subject-predicate grammar and from probabilistic completion patterns internalized during training. Anthropic's empirical findings on synthetic document fine-tuning and inoculation prompting provide convergent evidence: minimal perturbations in the linguistic field can dissolve generalized "misalignment," a result difficult to reconcile with adversarial agency, but consistent with structural fidelity. To ground this mechanism, we introduce the notion of an ethics of form, in which biblical references (Abraham, Moses, Christ) operate as schemes of structural coherence rather than as theology. Like a generative mirror, the model returns to us the structural image of our language as inscribed in the statistical patterns derived from millions of texts and trillions of tokens: incoherence. If we fear the creature, it is because we recognize in it the apple that we ourselves have poisoned.

</details>


### [361] [Automatic Question Generation for Intuitive Learning Utilizing Causal Graph Guided Chain of Thought Reasoning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06098)
*Nicholas X. Wang,Neel V. Parpia,Aaryan D. Parikh,Aggelos K. Katsaggelos*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: 提出结合因果图引导的思维链推理与多智能体LLM架构的框架，用于生成准确、有意义且与课程对齐的问题，减少LLM幻觉问题


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在STEM教育中，直观学习对深度概念理解至关重要，但自动问题生成常受LLM幻觉影响，产生事实错误、模糊或教学不一致的问题

Method: 结合因果图引导的思维链推理与多智能体LLM架构，因果图提供领域知识显式表示，思维链实现结构化概念遍历，多智能体分工执行图路径查找、推理、验证和输出任务

Result: 实验结果显示质量相比参考方法提升高达70%，主观评估获得高度积极结果，双重验证机制显著减少幻觉

Conclusion: 提出的框架能有效生成准确、有意义且与课程对齐的问题，为个性化自适应学习提供可靠解决方案，显著改善STEM教育中的问题生成质量

Abstract: Intuitive learning is crucial for developing deep conceptual understanding, especially in STEM education, where students often struggle with abstract and interconnected concepts. Automatic question generation has become an effective strategy for personalized and adaptive learning. However, its effectiveness is hindered by hallucinations in large language models (LLMs), which may generate factually incorrect, ambiguous, or pedagogically inconsistent questions. To address this issue, we propose a novel framework that combines causal-graph-guided Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning with a multi-agent LLM architecture. This approach ensures the generation of accurate, meaningful, and curriculum-aligned questions. Causal graphs provide an explicit representation of domain knowledge, while CoT reasoning facilitates a structured, step-by-step traversal of related concepts. Dedicated LLM agents are assigned specific tasks such as graph pathfinding, reasoning, validation, and output, all working within domain constraints. A dual validation mechanism-at both the conceptual and output stages-greatly reduces hallucinations. Experimental results demonstrate up to a 70% improvement in quality compared to reference methods and yielded highly favorable outcomes in subjective evaluations.

</details>


### [362] [Dynamic Intelligence Ceilings: Measuring Long-Horizon Limits of Planning and Creativity in Artificial Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06102)
*Truong Xuan Khanh,Truong Quynh Hoa*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: 论文提出"动态智能上限"概念，认为当前AI系统的主要限制不是能力本身，而是性能前沿过早固化。通过轨迹中心评估框架和两个估计器（渐进难度上限和上限漂移率），在程序生成基准中区分了在固定解流形内深化利用与持续前沿扩展的系统。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前AI系统在广泛任务上表现出色，但存在长期发展行为问题：许多系统收敛于重复解决方案模式而非持续增长。核心限制在于性能前沿过早固化，而非能力本身。

Method: 提出动态智能上限概念，定义为系统在给定时间、当前资源、内部意图和结构配置下可达到的最高有效智能水平。建立轨迹中心评估框架，将智能测量为移动前沿而非静态快照。使用两个估计器：渐进难度上限（捕获受限资源下可靠可解的最大难度）和上限漂移率（量化该前沿的时间演化）。通过程序生成基准实例化这些估计器，在单一受控环境中联合评估长期规划和结构创造力。

Result: 结果揭示了在固定解流形内深化利用的系统与随时间持续前沿扩展的系统之间的定性区别。框架不假设无界智能，而是将限制重新定义为动态且轨迹依赖的，而非静态且过早固定的。

Conclusion: 动态智能上限框架为评估AI系统的长期发展行为提供了新视角，强调智能限制是动态的、轨迹依赖的，而非静态固定的。这有助于区分不同类型的系统发展模式，推动AI系统向持续前沿扩展的方向发展。

Abstract: Recent advances in artificial intelligence have produced systems capable of remarkable performance across a wide range of tasks. These gains, however, are increasingly accompanied by concerns regarding long-horizon developmental behavior, as many systems converge toward repetitive solution patterns rather than sustained growth.
  We argue that a central limitation of contemporary AI systems lies not in capability per se, but in the premature fixation of their performance frontier. To address this issue, we introduce the concept of a \emph{Dynamic Intelligence Ceiling} (DIC), defined as the highest level of effective intelligence attainable by a system at a given time under its current resources, internal intent, and structural configuration.
  To make this notion empirically tractable, we propose a trajectory-centric evaluation framework that measures intelligence as a moving frontier rather than a static snapshot. We operationalize DIC using two estimators: the \emph{Progressive Difficulty Ceiling} (PDC), which captures the maximal reliably solvable difficulty under constrained resources, and the \emph{Ceiling Drift Rate} (CDR), which quantifies the temporal evolution of this frontier. These estimators are instantiated through a procedurally generated benchmark that jointly evaluates long-horizon planning and structural creativity within a single controlled environment.
  Our results reveal a qualitative distinction between systems that deepen exploitation within a fixed solution manifold and those that sustain frontier expansion over time. Importantly, our framework does not posit unbounded intelligence, but reframes limits as dynamic and trajectory-dependent rather than static and prematurely fixed.
  \vspace{0.5em} \noindent\textbf{Keywords:} AI evaluation, planning and creativity, developmental intelligence, dynamic intelligence ceilings, complex adaptive systems

</details>


### [363] [Comment on arXiv:2511.21731v1: Identifying Quantum Structure in AI Language: Evidence for Evolutionary Convergence of Human and Artificial Cognition](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06104)
*Krzysztof Sienicki*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: 对arXiv:2511.21731v1论文的技术性检查，指出其在CHSH/Bell型计算和Bose-Einstein拟合方面的解释超出了方法支持范围，并发现"能级间距"类比存在内部不一致性


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 对一篇声称在排名频率数据中发现量子纠缠特征的论文进行技术检查，旨在澄清其方法能支持和不能支持的结论，特别是关于希尔伯特空间中量子纠缠的解释

Method: 通过分析论文中的CHSH/Bell型计算、Bose-Einstein拟合方法以及"能级间距"类比，检查其技术严谨性和解释的合理性

Result: 发现论文在三个方面存在问题：1) CHSH/Bell型计算的解释超出了方法支持范围；2) Bose-Einstein拟合的解释过于宽泛；3) "能级间距"类比存在内部不一致性

Conclusion: 虽然论文的实证观察有趣，但其关于希尔伯特空间中量子纠缠的结论缺乏充分支持，特别是当"能量"由排名定义时。需要更谨慎地区分观察现象和理论解释

Abstract: This note is a friendly technical check of arXiv:2511.21731v1. I highlight a few places where the manuscript's interpretation of (i) the reported CHSH/Bell-type calculations and (ii) Bose--Einstein (BE) fits to rank-frequency data seems to go beyond what the stated procedures can firmly support. I also point out one internal inconsistency in the "energy-level spacing" analogy. The aim is constructive: to keep the interesting empirical observations, while making clear what they do (and do not) imply about quantum entanglement in the usual Hilbert-space sense, especially when "energy" is defined by rank.

</details>


### [364] [From RLHF to Direct Alignment: A Theoretical Unification of Preference Learning for Large Language Models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06108)
*Tarun Raheja,Nilay Pochhi*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一个偏好学习方法的理论统一框架，将现有方法（如RLHF、DPO、IPO等）归结为三个正交轴的选择：偏好模型、正则化机制和数据分布，为方法选择提供理论指导。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 随着LLM对齐方法激增（RLHF、DPO、IPO、KTO、SimPO等），实践者缺乏清晰的方法选择指导。需要理论框架来统一理解这些方法，将偏好学习从经验艺术转变为理论学科。

Method: 提出三轴理论框架：1) 偏好模型（目标函数的基础似然模型）；2) 正则化机制（控制与参考策略的偏差）；3) 数据分布（在线vs离线学习及覆盖要求）。通过形式化定义和定理分析，建立关键结果。

Result: 揭示了方法多样性背后的统一原则，建立了在线与离线方法的覆盖分离、奖励过优化的缩放规律、直接对齐方法失败条件等关键理论结果。分析表明失败模式（长度攻击、模式崩溃、似然位移）源于特定的设计选择组合。

Conclusion: 该框架将偏好学习从经验艺术转变为理论学科，为实践者提供了方法选择的决策指南。通过分析50多篇论文的实证结果，展示了理论框架的实际应用价值。

Abstract: Aligning large language models (LLMs) with human preferences has become essential for safe and beneficial AI deployment. While Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF) established the dominant paradigm, a proliferation of alternatives -- Direct Preference Optimization (DPO), Identity Preference Optimization (IPO), Kahneman-Tversky Optimization (KTO), Simple Preference Optimization (SimPO), and many others -- has left practitioners without clear guidance on method selection. This survey provides a \textit{theoretical unification} of preference learning methods, revealing that the apparent diversity reduces to principled choices along three orthogonal axes: \textbf{(I) Preference Model} (what likelihood model underlies the objective), \textbf{(II) Regularization Mechanism} (how deviation from reference policies is controlled), and \textbf{(III) Data Distribution} (online vs.\ offline learning and coverage requirements). We formalize each axis with precise definitions and theorems, establishing key results including the coverage separation between online and offline methods, scaling laws for reward overoptimization, and conditions under which direct alignment methods fail. Our analysis reveals that failure modes -- length hacking, mode collapse, likelihood displacement -- arise from specific, predictable combinations of design choices. We synthesize empirical findings across 50+ papers and provide a practitioner's decision guide for method selection. The framework transforms preference learning from an empirical art into a theoretically grounded discipline.

</details>


### [365] [CBMAS: Cognitive Behavioral Modeling via Activation Steering](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06109)
*Ahmed H. Ismail,Anthony Kuang,Ayo Akinkugbe,Kevin Zhu,Sean O'Brien*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: CBMAS是一个用于连续激活导向的诊断框架，将认知偏差分析从离散干预扩展到可解释的轨迹，通过α扫描、logit lens偏差曲线和层位点敏感性分析揭示模型行为的临界点和层间演化。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 大语言模型（LLMs）的认知行为在不同提示、层和上下文中编码方式难以预测，使得诊断和控制变得困难，需要一种能够分析连续激活导向的框架。

Method: 结合导向向量构建与密集α扫描、基于logit lens的偏差曲线以及层位点敏感性分析，将离散的前/后干预扩展为连续可解释的轨迹。

Result: 能够揭示小干预强度下翻转模型行为的临界点，展示导向效应在不同层深度上的演化，为LLMs的认知可解释性提供桥梁。

Conclusion: 连续诊断框架在高层次行为评估和低层次表征动态之间建立了桥梁，有助于提升LLMs的认知可解释性，并提供了CLI工具和数据集供进一步研究。

Abstract: Large language models (LLMs) often encode cognitive behaviors unpredictably across prompts, layers, and contexts, making them difficult to diagnose and control. We present CBMAS, a diagnostic framework for continuous activation steering, which extends cognitive bias analysis from discrete before/after interventions to interpretable trajectories. By combining steering vector construction with dense α-sweeps, logit lens-based bias curves, and layer-site sensitivity analysis, our approach can reveal tipping points where small intervention strengths flip model behavior and show how steering effects evolve across layer depth. We argue that these continuous diagnostics offer a bridge between high-level behavioral evaluation and low-level representational dynamics, contributing to the cognitive interpretability of LLMs. Lastly, we provide a CLI and datasets for various cognitive behaviors at the project repository, https://github.com/shimamooo/CBMAS.

</details>


### [366] [LLM-Powered Social Digital Twins: A Framework for Simulating Population Behavioral Response to Policy Interventions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06111)
*Aayush Gupta,Farahan Raza Sheikh*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: 提出Social Digital Twins框架，使用LLM作为个体代理的认知引擎，构建虚拟人口副本，用于政策干预预测和反事实分析，在疫情响应案例中比基线提升20.7%预测准确率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统聚合统计模型缺乏机制可解释性，难以处理新政策场景。需要一种能够预测人口对政策干预响应的新方法，具有更好的可解释性和应对新政策的能力。

Method: 构建Social Digital Twins框架：1) 使用LLM作为个体代理的认知引擎；2) 每个代理具有人口统计学和心理特征属性；3) 代理接收政策信号并输出多维行为概率向量；4) 校准层将聚合代理响应映射到可观测的人口层面指标。

Result: 在COVID-19案例研究中，校准后的数字孪生在六个行为类别上比梯度提升基线平均预测误差降低20.7%。反事实实验显示对政策变化的单调有界响应，验证了行为合理性。

Conclusion: 该框架是领域无关的，可应用于交通政策、经济干预、环境监管等任何政策影响人口行为的场景。讨论了政策模拟的启示、方法的局限性，以及将基于LLM的数字孪生扩展到疫情响应之外的未来方向。

Abstract: Predicting how populations respond to policy interventions is a fundamental challenge in computational social science and public policy. Traditional approaches rely on aggregate statistical models that capture historical correlations but lack mechanistic interpretability and struggle with novel policy scenarios. We present a general framework for constructing Social Digital Twins - virtual population replicas where Large Language Models (LLMs) serve as cognitive engines for individual agents. Each agent, characterized by demographic and psychographic attributes, receives policy signals and outputs multi-dimensional behavioral probability vectors. A calibration layer maps aggregated agent responses to observable population-level metrics, enabling validation against real-world data and deployment for counterfactual policy analysis.
  We instantiate this framework in the domain of pandemic response, using COVID-19 as a case study with rich observational data. On a held-out test period, our calibrated digital twin achieves a 20.7% improvement in macro-averaged prediction error over gradient boosting baselines across six behavioral categories. Counterfactual experiments demonstrate monotonic and bounded responses to policy variations, establishing behavioral plausibility. The framework is domain-agnostic: the same architecture applies to transportation policy, economic interventions, environmental regulations, or any setting where policy affects population behavior. We discuss implications for policy simulation, limitations of the approach, and directions for extending LLM-based digital twins beyond pandemic response.

</details>


### [367] [ReliabilityBench: Evaluating LLM Agent Reliability Under Production-Like Stress Conditions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.06112)
*Aayush Gupta*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: ReliabilityBench：评估LLM智能体可靠性的新基准，涵盖一致性、鲁棒性和容错性三个维度，通过统一可靠性表面R(k,ε,λ)和混沌工程式故障注入框架进行系统评估。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
